title: Apply the reporting principles
description: The organization shall apply all the reporting principles (Accuracy, Balance, Clarity, Comparability, Completeness, Sustainability context, Timeliness, Verifiability) specified in Section 4 of GRI 1: Foundation 2021. (Source: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.20)
description_ko: 조직은 GRI 1: Foundation 2021의 섹션 4에 명시된 모든 보고 원칙(정확성, 균형성, 명확성, 비교가능성, 완전성, 지속가능성 맥락, 시의적절성, 검증가능성)을 적용해야 한다. (출처: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.20)

required_disclosures.description: The organization shall apply all the reporting principles specified in section 4 of GRI 1: Foundation 2021.

title: Determine material topics
description: The organization shall determine its material topics, and review the applicable GRI Sector Standard(s) to determine whether each topic listed is material for the organization. (Source: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.12)
description_ko: 조직은 중대성 주제를 결정하고, 해당 섹터 표준의 각 주제가 조직에 중대성 주제인지 여부를 검토해야 한다. (출처: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.12)

required_disclosures.description: Determine its material topics.
Review the GRI Sector Standard(s) that apply to its sector(s) and determine whether each topic in the applicable Sector Standard(s) is a material topic for the organization.

title: Provide reasons for omission for disclosures and requirements that the organization cannot comply with
title_ko: 준수할 수 없는 공시 및 요구사항에 대한 누락 사유 제공
description: If the organization cannot comply with a disclosure or requirement, it shall specify the disclosure and provide one of the four permitted reasons for omission (Not applicable, Legal prohibitions, Confidentiality constraints, Information unavailable/incomplete) and the required explanation in the GRI content index. (Source: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.14)
description_ko: 조직이 공시 또는 요구사항을 준수할 수 없는 경우, GRI 콘텐츠 인덱스에 해당 공시를 명시하고 허용된 4가지 누락 사유(해당 없음, 법적 금지, 기밀 제약, 정보 불충분/불완전) 중 하나와 필요한 설명을 제공해야 한다. (출처: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.14)

required_disclosures.description: If the organization cannot comply with a disclosure or with a requirement in a disclosure for which reasons for omission are permitted, the organization shall in the GRI content index: specify the disclosure or the requirement it cannot comply with; provide one of the four reasons for omission included in Table 1 and the required explanation for that reason.

title: Publish a GRI content index
description: The organization shall publish a GRI content index that lists the statement of use, material topics, reported disclosures (with titles and sources), GRI Sector Standard references, location of reported information, and reasons for omission. (Source: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.16)
description_ko: 조직은 사용 선언문, 중대성 주제, 보고된 공시 목록(제목 및 출처 포함), 섹터 표준 참조 번호, 보고된 정보의 위치 및 누락 사유를 포함하는 GRI 콘텐츠 인덱스를 발행해야 한다. (출처: GRI 1: Foundation 2021, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: Publish a GRI content index that includes: statement of use; title of GRI 1 used; titles of applicable GRI Sector Standard(s); list of material topics; list of reported disclosures (with titles); titles of GRI Standards and other sources; GRI Sector Standard reference numbers; location where information can be found; and any reasons for omission used.

title: Organizational details
description: The organization shall report its legal name, nature of ownership and legal form, location of headquarters, and its countries of operation. (Source: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 법적 명칭, 소유 형태 및 법적 형식, 본사 위치, 운영 국가를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Report its legal name.
Report its nature of ownership and legal form.
Report the location of its headquarters.
Report its countries of operation.

title: Entities included in the organization's sustainability reporting
description: The organization shall list all entities included in its sustainability reporting and specify differences, if any, between this list and its financial reporting boundary. (Source: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 지속가능성 보고에 포함되는 모든 엔티티 목록을 제시하고, 재무 보고 범위와의 차이점이 있다면 이를 명시해야 한다. (출처: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: List all its entities included in its sustainability reporting.

If the organization has audited consolidated financial statements or financial information filed on public record, specify the differences between the list of entities included in its financial reporting and the list included in its sustainability reporting.
If the organization consists of multiple entities, explain the approach used for consolidating the information.

title: Reporting period, frequency and contact point
description: The organization shall specify the reporting period and frequency of its sustainability reporting, the reporting period for its financial reporting (and alignment explanation), the publication date, and the contact point for questions. (Source: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 지속가능성 보고의 보고 기간 및 빈도, 재무 보고 기간(일치 여부 설명), 보고서 발행일, 질문에 대한 연락처를 명시해야 한다. (출처: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Specify the reporting period for, and the frequency of, its sustainability reporting.
Specify the reporting period for its financial reporting and, if it does not align with the period for its sustainability reporting, explain the reason for this.
Report the publication date of the report or reported information.
Specify the contact point for questions about the report or reported information.

title: Restatements of information
description: The organization shall report restatements of information made from previous reporting periods and explain the reasons for and the effect of the restatements. (Source: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 이전 보고 기간에 대한 정보 재작성 내용을 보고하고, 재작성의 사유와 영향을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Report restatements of information made from previous reporting periods and explain: the reasons for the restatements; the effect of the restatements.

title: External assurance
description: The organization shall describe its policy and practice for seeking external assurance for its sustainability reporting, including whether and how the highest governance body and senior executives are involved. If assured, provide a link/reference to the report and describe the scope/basis/limitations of the assurance. (Source: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.12)
description_ko: 조직은 지속가능성 보고서의 외부 보증을 위한 정책 및 관행, 최고 거버넌스 기구 및 고위 경영진의 참여 여부를 보고해야 한다. 보증을 받은 경우, 보고서 링크/참조를 제공하고 보증 범위/근거/제한 사항을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 2: General Disclosures 2021, p.12)

required_disclosures.description: Describe its policy and practice for seeking external assurance, including whether and how the highest governance body and senior executives are involved.

If the organization's sustainability reporting has been externally assured: provide a link or reference to the external assurance report(s) or assurance statement(s); describe what has been assured and on what basis; describe the relationship between the organization and the assurance provider.

title: Process to determine material topics
description: The organization shall describe the process it has followed to determine its material topics, including how it identified actual and potential, negative and positive impacts, how it prioritized them, and the stakeholders/experts consulted. (Source: GRI 3: Material Topics 2021, p.16)
description_ko: 조직은 중대성 주제를 결정하기 위해 따른 프로세스(실제 및 잠재적 영향 파악 방법, 우선순위 지정 방법, 협의한 이해관계자/전문가 포함)를 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 3: Material Topics 2021, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the process followed to determine its material topics (identification, prioritization, and stakeholders/experts).

title: List of material topics
description: The organization shall list its material topics and report changes to the list compared to the previous reporting period. (Source: GRI 3: Material Topics 2021, p.18)
description_ko: 조직은 중대성 주제 목록을 제시하고, 이전 보고 기간과 비교하여 목록의 변경 사항을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 3: Material Topics 2021, p.18)

required_disclosures.description: List its material topics.
Report changes to the list of material topics compared to the previous reporting period.

title: Management of material topics
description: For each material topic, the organization shall describe the actual and potential impacts, involvement with negative impacts, related policies/commitments, management actions, effectiveness tracking, and stakeholder engagement. (Source: GRI 3: Material Topics 2021, p.19)
description_ko: 각 중대성 주제에 대해 조직은 실제 및 잠재적 영향, 부정적 영향 관련성, 관련 정책/약속, 관리 조치, 효과 추적, 이해관계자 참여 등을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 3: Material Topics 2021, p.19)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the actual and potential, negative and positive impacts.
Describe its policies or commitments regarding the material topic.
Describe actions taken to manage the topic and related impacts.
Report information about tracking the effectiveness of the actions taken.

title: GHG emissions
description: This topic covers direct (Scope 1), energy indirect (Scope 2), and other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions related to an oil and gas organization's activities. (Source: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.13)
description_ko: 석유 및 가스 부문 활동과 관련하여 기후 변화에 기여하는 온실가스 배출량(Scope 1, 2, 3 포함)을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Describe actions taken to manage flaring and venting and the effectiveness of actions taken. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report the percentage of gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions from CH4. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Climate adaptation, resilience, and transition
description: This topic covers an organization's strategy in relation to the transition to a low-carbon economy and the impacts of that transition on workers and local communities. (Source: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.16)
description_ko: 저탄소 경제로의 전환 전략 및 그 전환이 작업자와 지역사회에 미치는 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: Describe policies, commitments, and actions of the organization to prevent or mitigate the impacts of the transition to a low-carbon economy on workers and local communities. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 201-2 Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change

required_disclosures.description: Report the emissions potential for proven and probable reserves. (Additional sector recommendation)
Describe the organization's approach to public policy development and lobbying on climate change, including its stance on significant issues. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Biodiversity
description: This topic covers impacts on biodiversity, including on plant and animal species, genetic diversity and natural ecosystems, and the application of the mitigation hierarchy. (Source: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.22)
description_ko: 생물 다양성(종, 생태계)에 미치는 영향과 완화 계층(mitigation hierarchy) 적용 접근 방식을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.22)

required_disclosures.description: Describe policies and commitments to achieving no net loss or a net gain to biodiversity on operational sites. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 304-1 Operational sites owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas
304-2 Significant impacts of activities, products, and services on biodiversity
304-4 IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by operations

title: Waste
description: This topic covers impacts from waste, including hazardous waste, as a result of construction and rehabilitation activities in the oil and gas sector. (Source: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.24)
description_ko: 석유 및 가스 부문에서 발생하는 폐기물(위험 폐기물 포함) 및 건설/복구 활동의 결과로 발생하는 폐기물 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.24)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 306-1 Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts

required_disclosures.description: When reporting the composition of the waste generated, include a breakdown of the following waste streams, if applicable: drilling waste (muds and cuttings); scale and sludges; tailings. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Water and effluents
description: This topic covers impacts related to the withdrawal and consumption of water and the quality of water discharged by oil and gas operations. (Source: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.26)
description_ko: 조직의 물 취수 및 소비량, 그리고 방류되는 물의 수질이 생태계와 사람들에게 미치는 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 11: Oil and Gas Sector 2021, p.26)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 303-1 Interactions with water as a shared resource

required_disclosures.description: Report volume in megaliters of produced water and process wastewater discharged. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report the concentration (mg/L) of hydrocarbons discharged in produced water and process wastewater. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: GHG emissions
description: This topic covers direct (Scope 1), energy indirect (Scope 2), and other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions related to coal sector activities, noting the high significance of end-use Scope 3 emissions and methane (CH4) from mining. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.13)
description_ko: 석탄 부문 활동과 관련된 온실가스 배출량(Scope 1, 2, 3)을 다루며, 특히 최종 사용(Scope 3) 배출량과 채광 시 발생하는 메탄(CH4) 배출량의 중요성을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Report the percentage of gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions from CH₄. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report the breakdown of gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions by type of source (stationary combustion, process, fugitive). (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Climate adaptation, resilience, and transition
description: This topic covers an organization's strategy in relation to the transition to a low-carbon economy, and the impacts of that transition on workers and local communities, including managing stranded assets. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.15)
description_ko: 저탄소 경제로의 전환 전략 및 그 전환이 작업자와 지역사회에 미치는 영향, 좌초 자산 관리 등을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.15)

required_disclosures.description: Report whether the organization has a transition plan in place and whether it is a scheduled resolution item at AGM. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 201-2 Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change

required_disclosures.description: Describe the organization's approach to public policy development and lobbying on climate change. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Closure and rehabilitation
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to closing assets/facilities and rehabilitating operational sites, including impacts on environment, local communities, and workers. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.19)
description_ko: 운영 자산 및 시설 폐쇄와 복구에 대한 조직의 접근 방식, 그리고 그것이 환경, 지역 사회 및 작업자에게 미치는 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.19)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 402-1 Minimum notice periods regarding operational changes

required_disclosures.description: List the operational sites that: have closure and rehabilitation plans; have been closed; are undergoing closure activities. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the total monetary value of financial provisions made by the organization for closure and rehabilitation. (Additional sector disclosure)
Describe non-financial provisions made by the organization to manage the local community's socioeconomic transition. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 404-2 Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance programs

title: Air emissions
description: This topic covers impacts from emissions of sulfur oxides (SO₂), nitrogen oxides (NOx), particulate matter (PM), volatile organic compounds (VOC), carbon monoxide (CO), and heavy metals from coal activities. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.21)
description_ko: 석탄 활동으로 인한 황산화물(SO₂), 질소산화물(NOx), 미세먼지(PM), VOC, CO 및 중금속 배출의 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.21)

required_disclosures.description: Describe actions taken by the organization to prevent or mitigate potential negative impacts on local communities and workers from particulate matter (PM) emissions from coal dust. (Additional sector recommendation)
Describe actions taken to improve coal quality to reduce harmful air emissions in the use phase. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 305-7 Nitrogen oxides (NOx), sulfur oxides (SOx), and other significant air emissions

title: Biodiversity
description: This topic covers impacts on biodiversity, including on species, genetic diversity, and ecosystems, and the effects of large-scale infrastructure development common in the coal sector. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.23)
description_ko: 석탄 부문에서 흔히 발생하는 대규모 인프라 개발의 영향 등 생물 다양성(종, 생태계)에 미치는 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.23)

required_disclosures.description: Describe policies and commitments to achieving no net loss or a net gain to biodiversity on operational sites. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 304-1 Operational sites owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas
304-2 Significant impacts of activities, products and services on biodiversity
304-4 IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by operations

title: Waste
description: This topic covers impacts from high volumes of waste, including hazardous waste, overburden, rock waste, and tailings generated by coal extraction, processing, construction and rehabilitation. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.25)
description_ko: 석탄 채광 및 처리 활동으로 발생하는 대량의 폐기물(위험 폐기물, 폐석, 광미 포함) 및 그 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.25)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 306-1 Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts

required_disclosures.description: When reporting the composition of the waste generated, include a breakdown of the following waste streams: overburden; rock waste; tailings. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Water and effluents
description: This topic covers impacts related to the withdrawal, consumption, and quality of water discharged from coal activities, including issues like acid mine drainage. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.27)
description_ko: 석탄 활동으로 인한 물 취수, 소비 및 방류되는 물의 수질 관련 영향을 다루며, 산성 광산 배수(acid mine drainage)와 같은 이슈를 포함한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.27)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 303-1 Interactions with water as a shared resource

required_disclosures.description: Describe actions taken to prevent or mitigate negative impacts from acid mine drainage. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Economic impacts
description: This topic covers an organization's impacts on economic systems at local, national, and global levels, including positive impacts from procurement and employment, and negative impacts from economic disparity. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.29)
description_ko: 조직의 조달, 고용 등 활동이 지역, 국가, 글로벌 경제 시스템에 미치는 영향(긍정적 및 부정적 영향)을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.29)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the community development programs in place that are intended to enhance positive economic impacts for local communities. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 201-1 Direct economic value generated and distributed
204-1 Proportion of spending on local suppliers

title: Local communities
description: This topic covers socioeconomic, cultural, health, and human rights impacts on local communities, emphasizing community engagement and grievance mechanisms. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.31)
description_ko: 지역 사회에 대한 사회경제적, 문화적, 건강 및 인권 영향을 다루며, 지역 사회 참여 및 고충 처리 메커니즘을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.31)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 413-1 Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs

required_disclosures.description: Report the number and type of grievances from local communities identified, including: percentage of the grievances that were addressed and resolved; percentage of the grievances that were resolved through remediation. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 413-2 Operations with significant actual and potential negative impacts on local communities

title: Land and resource rights
description: This topic covers impacts from the organization's use of land and natural resources on human rights and tenure rights, including impacts from involuntary resettlement of local communities. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.33)
description_ko: 조직의 토지 및 천연자원 사용이 인권 및 토지 점유 권리에 미치는 영향, 특히 지역 사회 비자발적 이주와 관련된 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.33)

required_disclosures.description: List the locations of operations that caused or contributed to involuntary resettlement or where such resettlement is ongoing, and describe how peoples' livelihoods and human rights were affected and restored. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Rights of indigenous peoples
description: This topic covers impacts on the collective and individual rights of indigenous peoples, who are considered a vulnerable group at higher risk of experiencing negative impacts from coal activities. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.35)
description_ko: 석탄 활동으로 인해 부정적 영향을 받을 위험이 높은 취약 계층인 원주민의 집단적 및 개인적 권리에 미치는 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.35)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 411-1 Incidents of violations involving rights of indigenous peoples

required_disclosures.description: Report if the organization has been involved in a process of seeking free, prior and informed consent (FPIC) from indigenous peoples for any of the organization's activities. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Conflict and security
description: This topic covers the organization's security practices and its approach to operating in areas of conflict, including the potential for human rights impacts due to the use of security personnel. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.37)
description_ko: 조직의 보안 관행 및 분쟁 지역에서의 운영 접근 방식, 보안 인력 사용으로 인한 인권 영향 가능성 등을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.37)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 410-1 Security personnel trained in human rights policies or procedures

topic: Asset Integrity and Critical Incident Management
title: Asset integrity and critical incident management
title_ko: 자산 무결성 및 중대 사고 관리
description: This topic covers the prevention and control of critical incidents like mine collapses, tailings failures, and spills that can lead to fatalities and environmental damage. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.39)
description_ko: 광산 붕괴, 광미 시설 실패, 유출 등 치명적 사고를 초래할 수 있는 중대 사고의 예방 및 통제를 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.39)

required_disclosures.description: List the organization's tailings facilities, and report the name, location, ownership status, and recent risk assessment findings. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the number of critical incidents in the reporting period and describe their impacts. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Occupational health and safety
description: This topic covers impacts related to workers' health and safety, noting hazards specific to the coal sector like high-consequence work-related injuries, dust, and working in confined spaces. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.41)
description_ko: 작업자의 보건 및 안전 관련 영향을 다루며, 특히 고위험 부상, 분진, 밀폐 공간 작업 등 석탄 부문 특유의 위험 요소를 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.41)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 403-1 Occupational health and safety management system

title: Employment practices
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to job creation, terms of employment and working conditions for its workers, including disparities between employees and contract workers. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.43)
description_ko: 일자리 창출, 고용 조건 및 근로 조건에 대한 조직의 접근 방식을 다루며, 정규직과 계약직 간의 차별 문제를 포함한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.43)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 401-1 New employee hires and employee turnover
401-2 Benefits provided to full-time employees that are not provided to temporary or part-time employees
414-2 Negative social impacts in the supply chain and actions taken

title: Child labor
description: This topic covers impacts related to the organization's approach to identifying and addressing child labor, particularly the high risks in artisanal and small-scale mining supply chains. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.45)
description_ko: 조직의 아동 노동 식별 및 대응 접근 방식과 관련된 영향을 다루며, 특히 영세 채광 공급망의 높은 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.45)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 408-1 Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of child labor
414-1 New suppliers that were screened using social criteria

title: Forced labor and modern slavery
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to identifying and addressing forced labor and modern slavery, often a risk due to complex supply chains and interaction with state-owned enterprises. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.47)
description_ko: 강제 노동 및 현대판 노예제를 식별하고 대응하는 조직의 접근 방식을 다루며, 복잡한 공급망 및 국영 기업과의 상호작용으로 인한 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.47)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 409-1 Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of forced or compulsory labor
414-1 New suppliers that were screened using social criteria

topic: Freedom of Association and Collective Bargaining
title: Freedom of association and collective bargaining
description: This topic covers an organization's approach and impacts related to freedom of association and collective bargaining, which are fundamental human rights at work. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.49)
description_ko: 결사의 자유 및 단체 교섭과 관련된 조직의 접근 방식과 영향을 다루며, 이는 근로의 기본 인권이다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.49)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 407-1 Operations and suppliers in which the right to freedom of association and collective bargaining may be at risk

title: Non-discrimination and equal opportunity
description: This topic covers impacts from discrimination and practices related to diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunity, noting the gender imbalance and cultural barriers prevalent in the coal sector. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.51)
description_ko: 차별 및 다양성, 포용, 기회균등과 관련된 영향을 다루며, 석탄 부문에 만연한 성별 불균형 및 문화적 장벽을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.51)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 202-1 Ratios of standard entry level wage by gender compared to local minimum wage
405-1 Diversity of governance bodies and employees
405-2 Ratio of basic salary and remuneration of women to men
406-1 Incidents of discrimination and corrective actions taken

title: Anti-corruption
description: This topic covers impacts related to corruption and an organization's approach to contract and ownership transparency, noting the high risks in the coal sector, especially with politically exposed persons (PEPs). (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.53)
description_ko: 부패와 관련된 영향 및 계약/소유권 투명성에 대한 조직의 접근 방식을 다루며, 특히 정치적으로 노출된 인물(PEP)과의 상호작용에서 발생하는 석탄 부문의 높은 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.53)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the approach to contract transparency, including whether contracts and licenses are made publicly available. (Additional sector disclosure)
List the organization's beneficial owners and explain how the organization identifies the beneficial owners of business partners. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 205-1 Operations assessed for risks related to corruption

title: Payments to governments
description: This topic covers impacts from an organization's practices related to payments to governments and the organization's approach to transparency of such payments, including taxes, royalties, and project-level payments. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.56)
description_ko: 정부에 대한 조직의 지출 관행 및 투명성 접근 방식(세금, 로열티, 프로젝트 수준 지출 포함)과 관련된 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.56)

required_disclosures.description: Report a breakdown of the payments to governments levied at the project-level, by project and various revenue streams. (Additional sector recommendation)
For coal purchased from the state, report: volumes and types of coal purchased; full names of the buying entity and the recipient; payments made for the purchase. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Public policy
description: This topic covers an organization's approach to public policy advocacy and the impacts that can result from the influence an organization exerts, including lobbying on climate change. (Source: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.59)
description_ko: 조직의 공공 정책 옹호 접근 방식과 조직의 영향력이 초래할 수 있는 영향을 다루며, 기후 변화에 대한 로비를 포함한다. (출처: GRI 12: Coal Sector 2022, p.59)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the organization's stance on significant issues that are the focus of its participation in public policy development and lobbying. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Emissions
description: This topic addresses emissions into the air, including GHG, ODS, NOx, and SOx, which can have negative impacts on air quality, ecosystems, and human/animal health. Agriculture accounts for a significant portion of global GHG emissions. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.14)
description_ko: GHG, ODS, NOx, SOx 등 대기 배출물을 다루며, 이는 공기질, 생태계 및 인간/동물 건강에 부정적인 영향을 미친다. 농업은 전 세계 GHG 배출량의 상당 부분을 차지한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.14)

required_disclosures.description: When reporting on gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, include land use change emissions. (Additional sector recommendation)
When reporting on gross other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, include land use change emissions. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 305-7 Nitrogen oxides (NOx), sulfur oxides (SOx), and other significant air emissions

title: Climate adaptation and resilience
description: This topic covers how an organization adjusts to current and anticipated climate change-related risks and how it contributes to the ability of societies and economies to withstand these impacts, especially in relation to crop yields and food security. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.16)
description_ko: 조직이 현재 및 예상되는 기후 변화 관련 위험에 어떻게 적응하고 사회/경제의 회복력에 기여하는지를 다루며, 농작물 수확량 및 식량 안보와의 관계를 강조한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.16)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 201-2 Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change

required_disclosures.description: Describe the climate change-related scenarios used for identifying the risks and opportunities posed by climate change. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Biodiversity
description: This topic covers impacts on biodiversity (species, ecosystems) from agriculture, aquaculture, and fishing operations, including overfishing, by-catch, and land conversion. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.18)
description_ko: 농업, 양식업, 어업 활동으로 인한 생물 다양성(종, 생태계) 영향을 다루며, 남획, 혼획, 토지 전환 등을 포함한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.18)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the approach to preventing and managing escapes of farmed aquatic organisms. (Aquaculture sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 304-1 Operational sites owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas
304-2 Significant impacts of activities, products and services on biodiversity

required_disclosures.description: For each species of aquatic organisms produced/captured, report species scientific name, volume, farming/fishing methods, and production site/origin. (Aquaculture and Fishing sector disclosure)
Report the use of fishing products in feed, including species scientific name, and stock status. (Aquaculture sector disclosure)

title: Natural ecosystem conversion
description: This topic covers impacts related to changing a natural ecosystem to another use (e.g., deforestation for palm oil or soy) or a profound change in its composition, often linked to GHG emissions and biodiversity loss. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.21)
description_ko: 자연 생태계를 다른 용도로 전환하거나 구성에 심각한 변화를 초래하는 영향(예: 팜유/콩을 위한 벌채)을 다루며, 이는 GHG 배출 및 생물 다양성 손실과 연관된다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.21)

required_disclosures.description: Report the percentage of production volume from land owned, leased or managed by the organization determined to be deforestation- or conversion-free, by product. (Additional sector disclosure)
For products sourced by the organization, report the percentage of sourced volume determined to be deforestation- or conversion-free. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the size in hectares, the location, and the type of natural ecosystems converted since the cut-off date on land owned, leased, or managed by the organization. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Soil health
description: This topic covers impacts on soil health, including soil erosion, soil loss, reduction in soil fertility, and effects from tillage and fertilizer/pesticide use. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.24)
description_ko: 토양 건강에 대한 영향, 토양 침식, 토양 비옥도 감소, 경운 및 비료/농약 사용의 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.24)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the soil management plan, including: a link to this plan; main threats to soil health; soil management practices; and approach to input optimization (fertilizers). (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Pesticides use
description: This topic covers an organization's approach and impacts related to pesticide use, including their toxicity on non-target organisms, potential health risks to workers and communities, and integrated pest management (IPM). (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.26)
description_ko: 농약 사용 관련 조직의 접근 방식과 영향(비표적 유기체에 대한 독성, 작업자/지역 사회의 건강 위험, 종합 해충 관리(IPM) 포함)을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.26)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the pest management plan, including rationale for selection/application and other practices. (Additional sector recommendation)
Describe actions taken to prevent, mitigate and/or remediate negative impacts associated with the use of extremely and highly hazardous pesticides. (Additional sector recommendation)

Report the volume and intensity of pesticides used by the following toxicity hazard levels: Extremely hazardous; Highly hazardous; Moderately hazardous; Slightly hazardous; Unlikely to present an acute hazard. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Water and effluents
description: This topic covers impacts related to the withdrawal, consumption, and quality of water discharged from agriculture, aquaculture, and fishing activities, including nutrient buildup (eutrophication). (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.28)
description_ko: 농업, 양식업, 어업 활동으로 인한 물 취수, 소비 및 방류되는 물의 수질 관련 영향을 다루며, 영양분 축적(부영양화)과 같은 이슈를 포함한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.28)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 303-1 Interactions with water as a shared resource

title: Waste
description: This topic covers impacts from waste management (organic, inorganic, hazardous) including marine plastic pollution from fishing gear and risks from pathogens. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.30)
description_ko: 폐기물 관리(유기성, 무기성, 유해 폐기물)의 영향을 다루며, 어구로 인한 해양 플라스틱 오염 및 병원체 위험을 포함한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.30)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 306-1 Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts

required_disclosures.description: Report a breakdown of the total weight of waste generated on vessels (MARPOL categories) in metric tons. (Fishing sector recommendation)

title: Food security
description: This topic covers an organization's impacts on the availability, access, quality, and sustainability dimensions of food security, emphasizing food loss mitigation. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.32)
description_ko: 식량 안보의 가용성, 접근성, 품질 및 지속 가능성 측면에 미치는 영향을 다루며, 식량 손실 완화를 강조한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.32)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the effectiveness of actions and programs on food security at local, regional, national, or global levels. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report the total weight of food loss in metric tons and the food loss percentage, by the organization's main products or product category. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Food safety
description: This topic covers an organization's efforts to prevent contamination and ensure food safety, noting risks from antimicrobials, pesticides, heavy metals, and supply chain traceability. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.34)
description_ko: 식품 오염을 방지하고 식품 안전을 보장하기 위한 조직의 노력을 다루며, 항균제, 농약, 중금속 위험 및 공급망 추적성을 언급한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.34)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 416-1 Assessment of the health and safety impacts of product and service categories

required_disclosures.description: Report the percentage of production volume from sites certified to internationally recognized food safety standards, and list these standards. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the number of recalls issued for food safety reasons and the total volume of products recalled. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 416-2 Incidents of non-compliance concerning the health and safety impacts of products and services

title: Animal health and welfare
description: This topic covers impacts on animal health and the five freedoms of animal welfare in terrestrial and aquatic animal production, emphasizing responsible use of antibiotics and humane treatment. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.36)
description_ko: 육상 및 수생 동물 생산에서의 동물 건강 및 복지 5대 자유에 미치는 영향을 다루며, 항생제의 책임 있는 사용 및 인도적 처리를 강조한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.36)

required_disclosures.description: Report the percentage of production volume from sites of the organization certified to third-party animal health and welfare standards, and list these standards. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the survival percentage of farmed aquatic animals and the main causes of mortality. (Aquaculture sector disclosure)
Describe commitments for responsible and prudent use of antibiotics and how compliance with these commitments is evaluated. (Additional sector recommendation)
Describe policies regarding processing of animal products, animal transportation, handling, housing and confinement, and slaughter, by species. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Local communities
description: This topic covers socioeconomic, cultural, health, and human rights impacts on local communities, including those from land use, hazardous substances, and a lack of social protection for workers. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.38)
description_ko: 토지 사용, 유해 물질, 근로자 사회 보호 부족 등으로 인한 사회경제적, 문화적, 건강 및 인권 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.38)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 413-1 Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
413-2 Operations with significant actual and potential negative impacts on local communities

title: Land and resource rights
description: This topic covers impacts on human rights and tenure rights due to the organization's use of land and natural resources, including from involuntary resettlement and conflicts over unclear tenure rules. (Source: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.40)
description_ko: 토지 및 천연자원 사용으로 인한 인권 및 토지 점유 권리 영향을 다루며, 비자발적 이주 및 불분명한 점유 규정으로 인한 분쟁을 포함한다. (출처: GRI 13: Agriculture Aquaculture and Fishing Sectors 2022, p.40)

required_disclosures.description: List the locations of operations, where land and natural resource rights (including customary, collective, and informal tenure rights) may be affected by the organization's operations. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the number, size in hectares, and location of operations where violations of land and natural resource rights occurred and the groups of rightsholders affected. (Additional sector disclosure)
Describe commitments to respect land and natural resource rights (including customary, collective, and informal tenure rights). (Additional sector recommendation)
Describe how the commitments to respect land and natural resource rights are implemented with suppliers. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: GHG emissions
description: This topic covers direct (Scope 1), energy indirect (Scope 2), and other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions from mining activities, emphasizing the need for emissions reduction throughout the value chain and methane (CH4) from underground mines. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.17)
description_ko: 채광 활동으로 인한 온실가스 배출량(Scope 1, 2, 3)을 다루며, 가치 사슬 전반의 배출량 감축과 지하 광산의 메탄(CH4) 배출을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.17)

required_disclosures.description: When reporting on gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions, include land use change emissions. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report a breakdown of the gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions by mine site. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Climate adaptation and resilience
description: This topic covers how an organization adjusts to current and anticipated climate change-related risks, including its strategy for the transition to a low-carbon economy, and the heightened risks to water management and tailings facilities. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.19)
description_ko: 조직이 현재 및 예상되는 기후 변화 관련 위험에 어떻게 적응하는지, 저탄소 경제로의 전환 전략, 물 관리 및 광미 시설에 대한 증가된 위험 등을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.19)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the climate change-related scenarios used to assess the resilience of the organization's strategy, including a well-below 2°C, preferably 1.5°C, scenario. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 201-2 Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change

title: Biodiversity
description: This topic covers impacts on biodiversity (species, ecosystems) from mining activities, particularly the risk of habitat degradation from open-pit mining and deep-sea mining. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.23)
description_ko: 채광 활동으로 인한 생물 다양성 영향을 다루며, 특히 노천 채광 및 심해 채광으로 인한 서식지 파괴 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.23)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 101-1 Policies to halt and reverse biodiversity loss

title: Tailings
description: This topic covers the management of tailings (mining by-product, often liquid slurry) throughout the life of a mine and beyond closure, noting the catastrophic risks of facility failures to workers, communities, and the environment. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.28)
description_ko: 광미(채광 부산물) 시설 관리 전반을 다루며, 시설 실패 시 작업자, 지역사회 및 환경에 미치는 치명적인 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.28)

required_disclosures.description: Report whether the organization complies with the Global Industry Standard on Tailings Management (GISTM) and provide a link to public disclosure. (Additional sector recommendation)
List the organization's tailings facilities, and report the name, location, ownership status, safety classification, and risk assessment findings for each facility. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the tailings disposal methods used by the organization. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Water and effluents
description: This topic covers impacts related to the withdrawal, consumption, and quality of water discharged from mining activities, with specific focus on acid mine drainage and water stress in remote/arid areas. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.30)
description_ko: 채광 활동으로 인한 물 취수, 소비 및 방류되는 물의 수질 관련 영향을 다루며, 산성 광산 배수(acid mine drainage) 및 물 스트레스 문제를 중점적으로 다룬다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.30)

required_disclosures.description: Describe actions taken to prevent or mitigate negative impacts from acid mine drainage. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report water withdrawal by mine site. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report water discharge by mine site. (Additional sector recommendation)
Report water consumption by mine site. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 303-1 Interactions with water as a shared resource

title: Closure and rehabilitation
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to closing assets/facilities and rehabilitating operational sites to a physically, biologically, and chemically stable condition, including planning for socioeconomic transition. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.32)
description_ko: 운영 자산 및 시설 폐쇄와 복구 접근 방식을 다루며, 물리적, 생물학적, 화학적으로 안정적인 상태로 복구하고 사회경제적 전환 계획을 포함한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.32)

required_disclosures.description: For each mine site, report whether it: has a closure and rehabilitation plan; is undergoing closure; has been closed. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the total estimated closure cost, whether financial provision covers the full amount, and the financial instruments used. (Additional sector disclosure)
Describe non-financial provisions made by the organization to manage the local community's socioeconomic transition. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 402-1 Minimum notice periods regarding operational changes

title: Local communities
description: This topic covers socioeconomic, cultural, health, and human rights impacts on local communities, including those from land use, pollution, and the influx of workers, emphasizing grievance mechanisms and proactive engagement. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.38)
description_ko: 토지 사용, 오염, 외부 노동자 유입 등으로 인한 사회경제적, 문화적, 건강 및 인권 영향을 다루며, 고충 처리 메커니즘과 선제적 참여를 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.38)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 413-1 Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs

required_disclosures.description: For each mine site, report: the number and types of grievances from local communities; percentage addressed/resolved; percentage resolved through remediation. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 413-2 Operations with significant actual and potential negative impacts on local communities

title: Rights of Indigenous Peoples
description: This topic covers impacts on the collective and individual rights of Indigenous Peoples, who are at high risk of displacement, cultural damage, and impacts on water availability, emphasizing the need for Free, Prior, and Informed Consent (FPIC). (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.41)
description_ko: 비자발적 이주, 문화적 피해, 물 가용성 영향 위험이 높은 원주민의 권리 영향을 다루며, 자유롭고 사전 고지된 동의(FPIC)의 필요성을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.41)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 411-1 Incidents of violations involving rights of Indigenous Peoples

required_disclosures.description: Report if the organization has been involved in a process of seeking free, prior and informed consent (FPIC) from Indigenous Peoples for any of its activities. (Additional sector disclosure)
List the locations of operations and proven reserves where Indigenous Peoples are present or affected by activities of the organization. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Land and resource rights
description: This topic covers impacts on human rights and tenure rights due to the organization's use of land and natural resources, including involuntary resettlement, disputes over compensation, and effects on vulnerable groups. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.43)
description_ko: 토지 및 천연자원 사용으로 인한 인권 및 토지 점유 권리 영향을 다루며, 비자발적 이주, 보상 분쟁, 취약 계층에 대한 영향 등을 포함한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.43)

required_disclosures.description: List the mine sites where involuntary resettlement is planned, ongoing, or has taken place. For each site, report the number of persons displaced and describe how livelihoods/human rights were affected and restored. (Additional sector disclosure)
List the locations of operations where conflicts or violations of land and resource rights occurred, and describe the incidents and stakeholders affected. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Artisanal and small-scale mining
description: This topic covers impacts on ASM operators and the involvement of mining organizations with ASM through business relationships, interactions, or co-location, noting risks of child labor, forced labor, and environmental damage. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.45)
description_ko: 소규모 수공업 채광(ASM) 운영자에 대한 영향과 기업의 ASM 관련성(비즈니스 관계, 공동 위치)을 다루며, 아동 노동, 강제 노동, 환경 피해 위험을 언급한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.45)

required_disclosures.description: List the mine sites where ASM occurs on or in close proximity to the site. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the total number and nature of incidents involving ASM and actions taken to address them. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Security practices
description: This topic covers impacts from the use or presence of security personnel (public and private), including the potential for human rights violations, especially in conflict-affected areas and when interacting with local communities. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.47)
description_ko: 보안 인력(공공 및 민간) 사용 또는 존재로 인한 영향을 다루며, 특히 분쟁 지역 및 지역 사회와의 상호작용에서 인권 침해 가능성을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.47)

required_disclosures.description: Describe how the organization seeks to prevent or mitigate potential negative impacts from the use of public and private security providers. (Additional sector recommendation)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 410-1 Security personnel trained in human rights policies or procedures

title: Critical incident management
description: This topic covers the prevention and control of critical incidents (e.g., tailings failures, stope collapses, hazardous substance release) that can lead to fatalities, injuries, and environmental damage, and the organization's approach to emergency preparedness. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.49)
description_ko: 사망, 부상, 환경 피해를 초래할 수 있는 중대 사고(광미 실패, 붕괴, 유해 물질 유출 등)의 예방 및 통제, 그리고 비상 대비 접근 방식을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.49)

required_disclosures.description: Report the number of critical incidents in the reporting period, describe their impacts, and actions taken to remediate them. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the percentage of mine sites that have emergency preparedness and response plans in place, and list the sites that do not. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Occupational health and safety
description: This topic covers impacts related to workers' health and safety, noting high-consequence work-related injuries, specific hazards of underground mining (dust, gas), and risks to non-employees. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.51)
description_ko: 작업자의 보건 및 안전 관련 영향을 다루며, 고위험 부상, 지하 채광 특유의 위험(분진, 가스), 비고용인에 대한 위험 등을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.51)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 403-1 Occupational health and safety management system

required_disclosures.description: Report how the organization ensures the provision of gender-appropriate personal protective equipment for workers. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Employment practices
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to job creation, terms of employment, and working conditions, including job insecurity due to automation and disparities between local, migrant, and contract workers. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.53)
description_ko: 일자리 창출, 고용 조건 및 근로 조건에 대한 조직의 접근 방식을 다루며, 자동화로 인한 고용 불안 및 현지/이주/계약직 근로자 간의 격차를 포함한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.53)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 202-1 Ratios of standard entry-level wage by gender compared to local minimum wage
401-1 New employee hires and employee turnover
414-2 Negative social impacts in the supply chain and actions taken

title: Child labor
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to identifying and addressing child labor, particularly the high risks in artisanal and small-scale mining (ASM) supply chains and conflict-affected areas. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.55)
description_ko: 아동 노동 식별 및 대응 접근 방식을 다루며, 소규모 수공업 채광(ASM) 공급망 및 분쟁 지역의 높은 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.55)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 408-1 Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of child labor
414-1 New suppliers that were screened using social criteria

title: Forced labor and modern slavery
description: This topic covers the organization's approach to identifying and addressing forced labor and modern slavery, which are risks heightened by complex supply chains, ASM, and conflict-affected areas. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.57)
description_ko: 강제 노동 및 현대판 노예제를 식별하고 대응하는 조직의 접근 방식을 다루며, 복잡한 공급망, ASM, 분쟁 지역 등으로 인한 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.57)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 409-1 Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of forced or compulsory labor
414-1 New suppliers that were screened using social criteria

topic: Freedom of Association and Collective Bargaining
title: Freedom of association and collective bargaining
description: This topic covers an organization's approach and impacts related to freedom of association and collective bargaining, noting potential restrictions, worker vulnerability, and disparities between employees and contract workers. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.59)
description_ko: 결사의 자유 및 단체 교섭과 관련된 조직의 접근 방식과 영향을 다루며, 잠재적 제한, 근로자 취약성, 정규직/계약직 간의 격차를 언급한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.59)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 407-1 Operations and suppliers in which the right to freedom of association and collective bargaining may be at risk

required_disclosures.description: Report the number of strikes and lockouts involving 1,000 or more workers lasting one full shift or longer, and their total duration in worker days idle. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Non-discrimination and equal opportunity
description: This topic covers impacts from discrimination and practices related to diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunity, noting gender imbalance, remote work issues for women, and discrimination against local communities/Indigenous Peoples. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.61)
description_ko: 차별 및 다양성, 포용, 기회균등과 관련된 영향을 다루며, 성별 불균형, 여성의 원격 작업 문제, 지역 사회/원주민에 대한 차별 등을 언급한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.61)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 202-2 Proportion of senior management hired from the local community
405-2 Ratio of basic salary and remuneration of women to men
406-1 Incidents of discrimination and corrective actions taken

title: Anti-corruption
description: This topic covers impacts related to corruption and an organization's approach to contract and ownership transparency, noting the high risks in the mining sector, especially with politically exposed persons (PEPs) and in conflict-affected areas. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.63)
description_ko: 부패와 관련된 영향 및 계약/소유권 투명성에 대한 조직의 접근 방식을 다루며, PEP 및 분쟁 지역에서의 높은 위험을 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.63)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the approach to contract transparency, including whether contracts and licenses are made publicly available. (Additional sector disclosure)
Report the organization's beneficial owners, including joint ventures: name, nationality, country of residence, PEP status, and ownership level. (Additional sector disclosure)

required_disclosures.disclosure: 205-1 Operations assessed for risks related to corruption

title: Payments to governments
description: This topic covers impacts from an organization's practices related to payments to governments and the approach to transparency of such payments, including country-by-country reporting and project-level payments. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.65)
description_ko: 정부에 대한 조직의 지출 관행 및 투명성 접근 방식(국가별 보고 및 프로젝트 수준 지출 포함)과 관련된 영향을 다룬다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.65)

required_disclosures.description: Report a breakdown of the organization's corporate income tax paid and accrued in profit/loss, and other payments to governments, levied at the project-level, by project, and by material revenue stream. (Additional sector recommendation)

For minerals purchased from the state, report: volumes and types of minerals purchased; full names of the selling entity and the recipient; payments made for the purchase. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Public policy
description: This topic covers an organization's approach to public policy advocacy and the impacts that can result from the influence an organization exerts, including lobbying on climate change and local decision-making. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.68)
description_ko: 조직의 공공 정책 옹호 접근 방식과 조직의 영향력이 초래할 수 있는 영향을 다루며, 기후 변화에 대한 로비 및 지역 의사 결정 참여를 포함한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.68)

required_disclosures.description: Report whether the organization is a member of, or contributes to, any representative associations or committees that participate in public policy development and lobbying. (Additional sector recommendation)

title: Conflict-affected and high-risk areas
description: This topic covers an organization's approach and impacts related to operating in or sourcing from conflict-affected and high-risk areas (CAHRA), where the risk of human rights abuses, corruption, and financial flows contributing to conflict is heightened. (Source: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.70)
description_ko: 분쟁 및 고위험 지역(CAHRA)에서의 운영 또는 소싱과 관련된 조직의 접근 방식과 영향을 다루며, 인권 침해, 부패, 분쟁 자금 조달 위험 증가를 강조한다. (출처: GRI 14: Mining Sector 2024, p.70)

required_disclosures.description: List the locations of operations in conflict-affected or high-risk areas and how these were identified. (Additional sector disclosure)

Describe the due diligence process applied for operations in, or when sourcing from, conflict-affected and high-risk areas and whether it aligns with the OECD Due Diligence Guidance. (Additional sector disclosure)

For operations in conflict-affected or high-risk areas, report the potential negative impacts on workers and local communities, including actions to prevent or mitigate the impacts. (Additional sector disclosure)

title: Policies to halt and reverse biodiversity loss
title_ko: 생물 다양성 손실 방지 및 회복 정책
description: The organization shall describe its policies or commitments to halt and reverse biodiversity loss, how these are informed by the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework, and the goals and targets used to evaluate progress. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.7)
description_ko: 조직은 생물 다양성 손실 방지 및 회복을 위한 정책 또는 약속을 설명하고, 이것이 쿤밍-몬트리올 글로벌 생물다양성 프레임워크와 설정한 목표 및 지표를 어떻게 반영하는지 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.7)

required_disclosures.description: Describe its policies or commitments to halt and reverse biodiversity loss, and how these are informed by the 2050 Goals and 2030 Targets in the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework.
Report the extent to which these policies or commitments apply to the organization's activities and to its business relationships.
Report the goals and targets to halt and reverse biodiversity loss, whether they are informed by scientific consensus, the base year, and the indicators used to evaluate progress.

title: Management of biodiversity impacts
description: The organization shall report on its application of the mitigation hierarchy (avoid, minimize, restore, offset) to manage negative impacts on biodiversity, enhance synergies with climate actions, and ensure equitable social outcomes for stakeholders. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 생물 다양성에 대한 부정적 영향을 관리하기 위해 완화 계층(회피, 최소화, 복원, 상쇄)을 어떻게 적용하는지 보고해야 하며, 기후 변화 조치와의 시너지를 높이고 이해관계자에게 공평한 사회적 결과를 보장해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Report actions taken to avoid negative impacts on biodiversity.
Report actions taken to minimize negative impacts on biodiversity that were not avoided.
Report actions taken to restore and rehabilitate affected ecosystems.
Report actions taken to offset residual negative impacts on biodiversity.
Report transformative actions taken and additional conservation actions taken.
Report the size in hectares of the area under restoration/rehabilitation and the size of the area restored/rehabilitated for each site with the most significant impacts on biodiversity.
Describe how it enhances synergies and reduces trade-offs between actions taken to manage its biodiversity and climate change impacts.

title: Access and benefit-sharing
description: The organization shall describe the process to ensure compliance with access and benefit-sharing (ABS) regulations, and report on voluntary actions taken to advance ABS, particularly regarding traditional knowledge and genetic resources. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.14)
description_ko: 조직은 접근 및 이익 공유(ABS) 규정 준수를 보장하는 프로세스를 설명하고, 법적 의무를 넘어선 자발적 조치(전통 지식 및 유전자원 관련)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.14)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the process to ensure compliance with access and benefit-sharing regulations and measures.
Describe voluntary actions taken to advance access and benefit-sharing that are additional to legal obligations or when there are no regulations and measures.

title: Identification of biodiversity impacts
description: The organization shall explain how it has determined which of its sites and which products and services in its supply chain have the most significant actual and potential impacts on biodiversity. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.16)
description_ko: 조직은 어떤 운영 현장과 공급망 내의 어떤 제품 및 서비스가 생물 다양성에 가장 중대한 실제적 및 잠재적 영향을 미치는지 결정한 방법을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: Explain how it has determined which of its sites and which products and services in its supply chain have the most significant actual and potential impacts on biodiversity.

title: Locations with biodiversity impacts
description: The organization shall report the location, size, activities, and proximity to ecologically sensitive areas for sites with the most significant impacts, and the countries/jurisdictions where associated supply chain activities take place. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.20)
description_ko: 조직은 가장 중대한 영향이 있는 현장의 위치, 크기, 활동 및 생태학적으로 민감한 지역과의 근접성을 보고하고, 관련된 공급망 활동이 발생하는 국가/관할 구역을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.20)

required_disclosures.description: Report the location and size in hectares of its sites with the most significant impacts on biodiversity.
For each site reported under 101-5-a, report whether it is in or near an ecologically sensitive area, the distance to these areas, and the type of sensitive areas.
Report the activities that take place in each site reported under 101-5-a.

Report the products and services in its supply chain with the most significant impacts on biodiversity and the countries or jurisdictions where the activities associated with these products and services take place.

title: Direct drivers of biodiversity loss
description: The organization shall report information on the direct drivers of biodiversity loss (land/sea use change, exploitation of natural resources, pollution, invasive alien species) for sites and products in its supply chain with the most significant impacts. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.23)
description_ko: 조직은 가장 중대한 영향을 미치는 현장 및 공급망 제품에 대해 생물 다양성 손실의 직접적인 원인(토지/해양 이용 변화, 자연 자원 착취, 오염, 외래 침입종)에 대한 정보를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.23)

required_disclosures.description: For each site reported under 101-5-a where its activities lead or could lead to land and sea use change, report: the size in hectares of natural ecosystem converted, the size of intensively used or modified ecosystem converted, and the ecosystem type before/after conversion.
For each site reported under 101-5-a where its activities lead or could lead to the exploitation of natural resources, report: wild species harvested and water withdrawal/consumption in megaliters.
For each site reported under 101-5-a where its activities lead or could lead to pollution, report the quantity and the type of each pollutant generated.
For each site reported under 101-5-a where its activities lead or could lead to the introduction of invasive alien species, describe how they are or may be introduced.
For each product and service in its supply chain reported under 101-5-d, report the information required under 101-6-a, b, c, and d, with a breakdown by country or jurisdiction.
Report contextual information necessary to understand how the data has been compiled, including standards, methodologies, and assumptions used.

title: Changes to the state of biodiversity
description: The organization shall report on the changes in the condition and size of affected or potentially affected ecosystems, including the ecosystem type, size in hectares, and ecosystem condition (for base year and current period) for each site with most significant impacts. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.28)
description_ko: 조직은 가장 중대한 영향을 받는 현장에 대해 영향을 받았거나 잠재적으로 영향을 받은 생태계의 상태 변화(기준 연도 및 현재 보고 기간의 생태계 유형, 면적, 상태)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.28)

required_disclosures.description: For each site reported under 101-5-a, report the following information on affected or potentially affected ecosystems: the ecosystem type, size in hectares, and ecosystem condition for the base year and the current reporting period.
Report contextual information necessary to understand how the data has been compiled, including standards, methodologies, and assumptions used.

title: Ecosystem services
description: The organization shall list the ecosystem services and beneficiaries affected or potentially affected by its activities, and explain how they are or could be affected. (Source: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.31)
description_ko: 조직은 활동에 의해 영향을 받거나 잠재적으로 영향을 받는 생태계 서비스 및 수혜자를 나열하고, 이들이 어떻게 영향을 받거나 받을 수 있는지 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 101: Biodiversity 2024, p.31)

required_disclosures.description: For each site reported under 101-5-a, list the ecosystem services and beneficiaries affected or potentially affected by the organization's activities.
Explain how the ecosystem services and beneficiaries are or could be affected by the organization's activities.

title: Transition plan for climate change mitigation
title_ko: 기후 변화 완화를 위한 전환 계획
description: The organization shall describe its transition plan, including policies, actions, targets, governance, and alignment with the latest scientific evidence to limit global warming to 1.5°C. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.7)
description_ko: 조직은 기후 변화 완화 전환 계획(정책, 조치, 목표, 거버넌스 포함)을 설명하고, 이것이 지구 온난화를 1.5°C로 제한하기 위한 최신 과학적 증거와 어떻게 일치하는지 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.7)

required_disclosures.description: Describe its transition plan, including policies and actions to mitigate climate change.

Describe how the transition plan aligns with the latest scientific evidence on the global effort needed to limit global warming to 1.5°C, including the source of the climate change-related scenarios used, and the methodologies and assumptions used.
Report the total expenditure incurred by the implementation of the transition plan as monetary value and percentage of the total expenditure incurred in the reporting period.
Report the governance bodies or individual roles responsible for overseeing and implementing the transition plan and their responsibilities.

Report the targets to achieve the transition plan and progress toward them, including: GHG emissions reduction targets (102-4); targets to phase out fossil fuels; and other climate change mitigation targets.
Describe how the transition plan aligns with just transition principles and how engagement with stakeholders informs its development and implementation.
Describe how its public policy activities, including lobbying activities, are consistent with the transition plan.

title: Climate change adaptation plan
description: The organization shall describe its plan to adapt to the effects of climate change, including physical and transition risks, planned actions, targets, expenditure, governance, and alignment with just transition principles. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 기후 변화 영향에 적응하기 위한 계획(물리적/전환 위험, 계획된 조치, 목표, 지출, 거버넌스 포함)과 저스트 트랜지션(Just Transition) 원칙과의 정합성을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Describe the impacts on people and the environment associated with its climate change-related risks and opportunities and how they were considered in the development of the adaptation plan.
Describe its adaptation plan, including: policies and actions; scenario sources; expenditure; governance; targets; and alignment with just transition principles.
Describe the impacts on people and the environment from implementing the adaptation plan and the actions taken to manage them.

title: Just transition
description: The organization shall report metrics on the impacts of its transition or adaptation efforts on workers, local communities, and Indigenous Peoples, including job creation, termination, redeployment, training, and living wage gaps. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.18)
description_ko: 조직은 전환 또는 적응 노력이 근로자, 지역 사회 및 원주민에게 미치는 영향에 대한 측정 항목(일자리 창출, 종료, 재배치, 교육, 생활 임금 격차 포함)을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.18)

required_disclosures.description: Report the total number of new employees recruited and a breakdown of this total by gender and employee type.
Report the total number of employees whose work was terminated and a breakdown of this total by gender and employee type.
Report the total number of redeployed employees and a breakdown of this total by gender and employee type.
Report the total number of employees who received training for up- and re-skilling, and a breakdown of this total by gender and employee type.
Report the total number and percentage of new employees/workers whose basic pay is at or above the cost-of-living estimate, and describe actions taken to address any gaps.
List the locations of operation where the organization has impacts on local communities and Indigenous Peoples.

Report the percentage of locations of operation listed under 102-3-h in which an agreement has been reached with affected or potentially affected local communities or Indigenous Peoples to safeguard their interests.

title: GHG emissions reduction targets and progress
title_ko: GHG 배출량 감축 목표 및 진행 상황
description: The organization shall report its short-, medium-, and long-term gross Scope 1, 2, and 3 GHG emissions reduction targets (in mtCO2e and as a percentage of base year emissions), its progress toward them, and how targets align with the latest scientific evidence (1.5°C). (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.21)
description_ko: 조직은 단기, 중기, 장기 Scope 1, 2, 3 GHG 배출량 감축 목표(mtCO2e 및 기준 연도 대비 백분율) 및 진행 상황을 보고하고, 목표가 최신 과학적 증거(1.5°C)와 어떻게 일치하는지 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.21)

required_disclosures.description: Report short-, medium-, and long-term gross Scope 1, 2, and 3 GHG emissions reduction targets in metric tons of CO2 equivalent and as a percentage of base year emissions, and specify how the targets are reported (separately, combined, etc.).
Explain how the gross GHG emissions reduction targets align with the latest scientific evidence on the effort needed to limit global warming to 1.5°C.

For each gross GHG emissions reduction target, report the base year, including: rationale, base year emissions, context for recalculations, and previously reported base year emissions if recalculated.

For each gross GHG emissions reduction target, explain how the progress toward the target was achieved and whether it is due to: reductions as a result of the organization's initiatives; or other factors.

title: Scope 1 GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report gross Scope 1 GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, including a breakdown by gas (CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, NF3), biogenic CO2 emissions, base year, consolidation approach, and methodologies used. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.25)
description_ko: 조직은 총 Scope 1 GHG 배출량(이산화탄소 환산톤), 가스별 세부 내역, 바이오제닉 CO2 배출량, 기준 연도, 통합 접근 방식, 방법론 등을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.25)

required_disclosures.description: Report gross Scope 1 GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, and in the calculation: include emissions of all 7 Kyoto gases; include biogenic non-CO₂ GHG; exclude GHG removals, trades, and avoided emissions; use 100-year GWP from latest IPCC report.
Provide a breakdown of gross Scope 1 GHG emissions by all 7 Kyoto gases, in metric tons and metric tons of CO2 equivalent.
Report biogenic CO2 emissions from the combustion or biodegradation of biomass from owned or controlled sources in metric tons, separately from gross Scope 1 GHG emissions.
Report the base year for the calculation, including: rationale, base year emissions, context for recalculations, and previously reported base year emissions if recalculated.
Report the consolidation approach for Scope 1 GHG emissions that is consistently applied across Scope 1, Scope 2, and Scope 3 GHG emissions.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used, including the source of the emission factors used.

title: Scope 2 GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report gross location-based and, if applicable, market-based Scope 2 GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, including a breakdown by gas, biogenic CO2 emissions, base year, consolidation approach, and methodologies used. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.28)
description_ko: 조직은 위치 기반(location-based) 및 시장 기반(market-based) Scope 2 GHG 배출량(이산화탄소 환산톤), 가스별 세부 내역, 바이오제닉 CO2 배출량, 기준 연도, 통합 접근 방식, 방법론 등을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.28)

required_disclosures.description: Report gross location-based and, if applicable, market-based Scope 2 GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, including: emissions of CO2, CH4, and N2O; biogenic non-CO₂ GHG; exclusion of removals/trades/avoided emissions; and 100-year GWP from latest IPCC report.
Provide a breakdown of gross location-based Scope 2 GHG emissions by CO2, CH4, and N2O in metric tons and metric tons of CO2 equivalent.
Report location-based and, if applicable, market-based biogenic CO2 emissions from electricity use in metric tons, separately from gross Scope 2 GHG emissions.
Report the base year for the calculation, including: rationale, base year emissions, context for recalculations, and previously reported base year emissions if recalculated.
Report the consolidation approach for Scope 2 GHG emissions that is consistently applied across Scope 1, Scope 2, and Scope 3 GHG emissions.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used, including the source of the emission factors used.

title: Scope 3 GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report gross Scope 3 GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, including: emissions for each of the 15 categories, breakdown by gas (including biogenic non-CO2 GHG), biogenic CO2 emissions, base year, consolidation approach, and methodologies used. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.31)
description_ko: 조직은 총 Scope 3 GHG 배출량(이산화탄소 환산톤), 15개 카테고리별 세부 내역, 바이오제닉 CO2 배출량, 기준 연도, 통합 접근 방식, 방법론 등을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.31)

required_disclosures.description: Report gross Scope 3 GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, and in the calculation: include emissions for each Scope 3 category and all 7 Kyoto gases; include biogenic non-CO₂ GHG; exclude GHG removals, trades, and avoided emissions; use 100-year GWP from latest IPCC report.
Provide a breakdown of gross Scope 3 GHG emissions by each of the 15 Scope 3 categories in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.

Report biogenic CO2 emissions from the combustion or biodegradation of biomass in the upstream and downstream value chain in metric tons, separately from gross Scope 3 GHG emissions, and a breakdown of this total by each of the 15 Scope 3 categories.
Report the base year for the calculation, including: rationale, base year emissions, context for recalculations, and previously reported base year emissions if recalculated.
Report the consolidation approach for Scope 3 GHG emissions that is consistently applied across Scope 1, Scope 2, and Scope 3 GHG emissions.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used, including the sources of the emission factors used.

title: GHG emissions intensity
description: The organization shall report GHG emissions intensity ratio(s), including the gross GHG emissions (numerator) and the organization-specific metric (denominator), and report the scope(s) of GHG emissions included. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.34)
description_ko: 조직은 GHG 배출량 집약도 비율(총 GHG 배출량/조직별 지표), 그리고 포함된 Scope(1, 2, 3)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.34)

required_disclosures.description: Report GHG emissions intensity ratio(s), including the gross GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent (the numerator) and the organization-specific metric (the denominator) chosen.
Report the scope(s) of GHG emissions included in the intensity ratio(s), whether Scope 1, Scope 2, or Scope 3.

title: GHG removals in the value chain
description: The organization shall report the total amount of Scope 1 GHG removals in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, excluding GHG trades, broken down by each storage pool (land-based or geologic), and report the intended use and management of non-permanence risk. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.35)
description_ko: 조직은 총 Scope 1 GHG 제거량(이산화탄소 환산톤), 저장 풀별 세부 내역(육상 또는 지질), 의도된 사용 목적, 비영구성 위험 관리 등을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.35)

required_disclosures.description: Report the total amount of Scope 1 GHG removals in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, excluding any GHG trades, and a breakdown of this total by each storage pool.
For each type of storage pool, describe how quality criteria are monitored to manage the risk of non-permanence.
Report the intended use of GHG removals (e.g., counterbalancing residual GHG emissions).

Describe the impacts on people and the environment from its Scope 1 GHG removals and the actions taken to manage them, including for: workers, local communities, and Indigenous Peoples; and biodiversity.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used.

title: Carbon credits
description: The organization shall report the total amount of carbon credits canceled in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, broken down by removal or reduction projects, for each project, report required information (name, ID, vintage, etc.) and describe adherence to quality criteria. (Source: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.38)
