description_ko: 조직은 취소된 총 탄소 크레딧(이산화탄소 환산톤)을 보고하고, 제거 또는 감축 프로젝트별로 세부 내역을 나누어 각 프로젝트의 상세 정보(이름, ID, 빈티지 등) 및 품질 기준 준수 여부를 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 102: Climate Change 2025, p.38)

required_disclosures.description: Report the total amount of carbon credits canceled in metric tons of CO2 equivalent and a breakdown of this total by removal or reduction projects.
For each project where carbon credits have been canceled, report: project name and ID; project type; cancelation serial number, cancelation date, and vintage; host country and issuing registry.

For each carbon credit project, describe how the project adheres to each of the following quality criteria: additionality, credible baselines, permanence, leakage avoidance, unique issuance/claiming, regular monitoring, independent validation/verification, and GHG program governance.
Report the purpose of carbon credit cancelation.
Describe the impacts on people and the environment from projects where carbon credits are purchased and how the organization continuously monitors and evaluates them.

title: Energy policies and commitments
description: The organization shall describe how its energy-related policies and commitments contribute to energy consumption reduction, energy efficiency, and the transition to renewable energy sources, and the impacts that may result from its energy consumption and transition. (Source: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.7)
description_ko: 조직은 에너지 관련 정책 및 약속이 에너지 소비 절감, 효율성, 재생 에너지 전환에 어떻게 기여하는지, 그리고 에너지 소비 및 전환으로 인해 발생할 수 있는 경제, 환경 및 사람에 대한 영향을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.7)

required_disclosures.description: Describe how its energy-related policies and commitments contribute to energy consumption reduction, energy efficiency, and the transition to renewable energy sources.
Describe the impacts on the economy, environment, and people that may result from its energy consumption and the transition to renewable energy sources.

title: Energy consumption and self-generation within the organization
title_ko: 조직 내 에너지 소비 및 자가 발전
description: The organization shall report total fuel consumption, purchased electricity, heating, cooling, and steam consumption, and self-generated consumption within the organization, with a breakdown by renewable and non-renewable sources. (Source: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 조직 내 총 연료 소비, 구매한 전력/열/냉방/증기 소비, 자가 발전 소비를 재생 및 비재생 에너지원별로 분류하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Report total fuel consumption within the organization in joules, watt-hours, or multiples, and a breakdown of this total by renewable/non-renewable sources and by activity.
Report total purchased electricity, heating, cooling, and steam consumption within the organization, and a breakdown of this total by renewable/non-renewable sources and by type of energy.
Report total self-generated renewable electricity, heating, cooling, and steam consumption within the organization, and a breakdown of this total by type of energy.
Report total self-generated electricity, heating, cooling, and steam sold, and a breakdown of this total by renewable/non-renewable sources.
Report whether contractual instruments are used to disclose information on purchased energy, and if so, describe adherence to quality criteria.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used.

title: Upstream and downstream energy consumption
description: The organization shall report total significant energy consumption in its upstream and downstream value chain (Scope 3, GHG Protocol categories 1-15) and list the categories in which significant energy consumption occurs. (Source: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 상류 및 하류 가치 사슬에서 발생하는 총 유의미한 에너지 소비량(주요 Scope 3 카테고리별)을 보고하고, 유의미한 에너지 소비가 발생하는 상류 및 하류 카테고리를 나열해야 한다. (출처: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Report total significant energy consumption in its upstream and downstream value chain in joules, watt-hours, or multiples, and list the upstream and downstream categories in which significant energy consumption occurs.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used, including the source of the conversion factors used.

title: Energy intensity
description: The organization shall report energy intensity ratio(s) (numerator: energy consumption in joules/watt-hours/multiples; denominator: organization-specific metric) and report the scope(s) and types of energy consumption included. (Source: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.15)
description_ko: 조직은 에너지 집약도 비율(분자: 에너지 소비량; 분모: 조직별 특정 지표)과 포함된 에너지 소비 범위(조직 내, 상류, 하류) 및 에너지 유형(연료, 전력 등)을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.15)

required_disclosures.description: Report energy intensity ratio(s), including the gross energy consumption and the organization-specific metric chosen to calculate the ratio(s).
Report whether the energy intensity ratio(s) include energy consumption within the organization, in its upstream and downstream value chain, or both.
Report the types of energy consumption included in the energy intensity ratio(s), whether fuel, electricity, heating, cooling, or steam.

title: Reduction in energy consumption
description: The organization shall report the reduction in energy consumption achieved (in joules/watt-hours/multiples), how it is due to conservation/efficiency initiatives or other factors, the scope and type of energy consumption included, and the base year/baseline used. (Source: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.17)
description_ko: 조직은 달성한 에너지 소비 절감량, 절감 원인(보존/효율성 이니셔티브 또는 기타 요인), 포함된 에너지 소비 범위/유형, 사용된 기준 연도/기준선 등을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 103: Energy 2025, p.17)

required_disclosures.description: Report the reduction in energy consumption achieved in joules, watt-hours, or multiples, including whether and how it is due to: reductions from conservation and efficiency initiatives; or other factors.
Report the types of energy consumption included in the reduction, whether fuel, electricity, heating, cooling, or steam.
Report whether the reduction in energy consumption was achieved within the organization, in its upstream and downstream value chain, or both, and list the categories in which reduction was achieved.
Report the base year or baseline for calculating the reduction in energy consumption, including: rationale; energy consumption in the base year or baseline.
Report standards, methodologies, assumptions, and calculation tools used.

title: Direct economic value generated and distributed
title_ko: 직접적인 경제적 가치 창출 및 배분
description: The organization shall report Direct economic value generated and distributed (EVG&D) on an accruals basis, including basic components (revenues, distributed value, retained value) for the organization's global operations. (Source: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 글로벌 운영에 대한 기본 구성 요소(수익, 배분된 가치, 보유된 가치)를 포함하여 직접적인 경제적 가치 창출 및 배분(EVG&D)을 발생주의 기준으로 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Direct economic value generated and distributed (EVG&D) on an accruals basis, including the basic components for the organization's global operations: Revenues; Economic value distributed; Economic value retained.
Where significant, report EVG&D separately at country, regional, or market levels, and the criteria used for defining significance.

title: Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change
title_ko: 기후 변화로 인한 재무적 영향 및 기타 위험과 기회
description: The organization shall report risks and opportunities posed by climate change that have the potential to generate substantive changes in operations, revenue, or expenditure, including descriptions, impacts, financial implications, management methods, and costs of actions taken. (Source: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 운영, 수익, 지출에 실질적인 변화를 초래할 수 있는 기후 변화로 인한 위험과 기회(설명, 영향, 재무적 영향, 관리 방법 및 조치 비용 포함)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Risks and opportunities posed by climate change that have the potential to generate substantive changes in operations, revenue, or expenditure, including: description of risk/opportunity; impact description; financial implications; management methods; and costs of actions taken.

If the organization does not have a system in place to calculate the financial implications or costs, or to make revenue projections, it shall report its plans and timeline to develop the necessary systems.

title: Defined benefit plan obligations and other retirement plans
title_ko: 확정 급여 제도 의무 및 기타 퇴직 제도
description: The organization shall report the estimated value of defined benefit plan liabilities or fund coverage, the percentage of salary contributed by employee/employer, and the level of participation in retirement plans. (Source: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 확정 급여 제도 부채 또는 펀드 보장 범위의 추정 가치, 근로자/고용주가 기여한 급여 비율, 퇴직 제도 참여 수준을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: If the plan's liabilities are met by the organization's general resources, the estimated value of those liabilities.
If a separate fund exists, the extent to which the scheme's liabilities are covered by assets, basis of estimate, and when it was made.
If the fund is not fully covered, explain the strategy to work towards full coverage and the timescale.
Percentage of salary contributed by employee or employer.
Level of participation in retirement plans.

title: Financial assistance received from government
description: The organization shall report the total monetary value of financial assistance received from any government (including tax relief, subsidies, grants, and royalty holidays) during the reporting period, a breakdown of this information by country, and the extent of government presence in the shareholding structure. (Source: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.14)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 정부로부터 받은 재정 지원(세금 감면, 보조금, 보조금 및 로열티 면제 포함)의 총 통화 가치, 국가별 세부 내역, 주주 구성 내 정부의 존재 여부 및 정도를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016, p.14)

required_disclosures.description: Total monetary value of financial assistance received by the organization from any government, including a breakdown of the type of assistance.
The information in 201-4-a by country.
Whether, and the extent to which, any government is present in the shareholding structure.

title: Ratios of standard entry level wage by gender compared to local minimum wage
title_ko: 성별 기준 초임 임금과 현지 최저 임금 대비 비율
description: The organization shall report the ratio of the entry level wage by gender at significant locations of operation compared to the local minimum wage, or describe actions taken to determine whether non-employees are paid above the minimum wage. (Source: GRI 202: Market Presence 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 주요 사업장별 성별 초임 임금과 현지 최저 임금 대비 비율을 보고하거나, 최저 임금 규정의 적용을 받는 비고용인 근로자에게 최저 임금 이상을 지급하고 있는지 확인하기 위해 취한 조치를 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 202: Market Presence 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: When a significant proportion of employees are compensated based on wages subject to minimum wage rules, report the relevant ratio of the entry level wage by gender at significant locations of operation to the minimum wage.

When a significant proportion of other workers (excluding employees) performing the organization's activities are compensated based on wages subject to minimum wage rules, describe the actions taken to determine whether these workers are paid above the minimum wage.
Whether a local minimum wage is absent or variable at significant locations of operation, by gender.
The definition used for 'significant locations of operation'.

title: Proportion of senior management hired from the local community
title_ko: 현지 지역 사회에서 채용된 고위 경영진 비율
description: The organization shall report the percentage of senior management at significant locations of operation that are hired from the local community, along with the definitions used for 'senior management', 'local', and 'significant locations of operation'. (Source: GRI 202: Market Presence 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 주요 사업장별 현지 지역 사회에서 채용된 고위 경영진의 비율을 보고하고, '고위 경영진', '현지', '주요 사업장'에 사용된 정의를 함께 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 202: Market Presence 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of senior management at significant locations of operation that are hired from the local community.
The definition used for 'senior management'.
The organization's geographical definition of 'local'.
The definition used for 'significant locations of operation'.

title: Infrastructure investments and services supported
description: The organization shall report the extent of development of significant infrastructure investments and services supported, current or expected impacts on communities and local economies, and whether these engagements are commercial, in-kind, or pro bono. (Source: GRI 203: Indirect Economic Impacts 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 중대한 인프라 투자 및 지원 서비스 개발의 정도, 지역 사회 및 지역 경제에 대한 현재 또는 예상되는 영향, 그리고 이러한 활동이 상업적, 현물 제공 또는 공익 활동인지 여부를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 203: Indirect Economic Impacts 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Extent of development of significant infrastructure investments and services supported.
Current or expected impacts on communities and local economies, including positive and negative impacts where relevant.
Whether these investments and services are commercial, in-kind, or pro bono engagements.

title: Significant indirect economic impacts
description: The organization shall report examples of significant identified indirect economic impacts (positive and negative) and their significance in the context of external benchmarks and stakeholder priorities. (Source: GRI 203: Indirect Economic Impacts 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 식별된 중대한 간접 경제 영향(긍정적 및 부정적 영향 포함)의 사례와 외부 벤치마크 및 이해관계자 우선순위의 맥락에서 이 영향의 중요성을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 203: Indirect Economic Impacts 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Examples of significant identified indirect economic impacts of the organization, including positive and negative impacts.
Significance of the indirect economic impacts in the context of external benchmarks and stakeholder priorities, such as national and international standards, protocols, and policy agendas.

title: Proportion of spending on local suppliers
description: The organization shall report the percentage of the procurement budget spent on suppliers local to significant locations of operation, along with the organization's geographical definition of 'local' and the definition of 'significant locations of operation'. (Source: GRI 204: Procurement Practices 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 주요 사업장 현지 공급업체에 지출된 조달 예산의 비율을 보고하고, '현지' 및 '주요 사업장'의 지리적 정의를 함께 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 204: Procurement Practices 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of the procurement budget used for significant locations of operation that is spent on suppliers local to that operation.
The organization's geographical definition of 'local'.
The definition used for 'significant locations of operation'.

title: Operations assessed for risks related to corruption
title_ko: 부패 관련 위험이 평가된 운영 부문
description: The organization shall report the total number and percentage of operations assessed for risks related to corruption and the significant risks identified through the risk assessment. (Source: GRI 205: Anti-corruption 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 부패 관련 위험이 평가된 운영 부문의 총 수와 비율, 그리고 위험 평가를 통해 식별된 중대한 부패 관련 위험을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 205: Anti-corruption 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total number and percentage of operations assessed for risks related to corruption.
Significant risks related to corruption identified through the risk assessment.

title: Communication and training about anti-corruption policies and procedures
title_ko: 반부패 정책 및 절차에 대한 소통 및 교육
description: The organization shall report the total number and percentage of governance body members, employees, and business partners that anti-corruption policies and training have been communicated to/received, broken down by category and region. (Source: GRI 205: Anti-corruption 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 반부패 정책 및 교육이 전달/제공된 지배기구 구성원, 직원, 비즈니스 파트너의 총 수와 비율을 범주 및 지역별로 분류하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 205: Anti-corruption 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Total number and percentage of governance body members that the organization's anti-corruption policies and procedures have been communicated to, broken down by region.
Total number and percentage of employees that the organization's anti-corruption policies and procedures have been communicated to, broken down by employee category and region.
Total number and percentage of business partners that the organization's anti-corruption policies and procedures have been communicated to, broken down by type of business partner and region.
Total number and percentage of governance body members that have received training on anti-corruption, broken down by region.
Total number and percentage of employees that have received training on anti-corruption, broken down by employee category and region.

title: Confirmed incidents of corruption and actions taken
title_ko: 확인된 부패 사건 및 취해진 조치
description: The organization shall report the total number and nature of confirmed incidents of corruption, incidents resulting in dismissed/disciplined employees or terminated/non-renewed contracts with business partners, and public legal cases regarding corruption. (Source: GRI 205: Anti-corruption 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 확인된 부패 사건의 총 수와 성격, 해고/징계된 직원 또는 계약 종료/갱신 거부된 비즈니스 파트너와 관련된 사건, 부패 관련 공공 법적 소송 및 결과를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 205: Anti-corruption 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Total number and nature of confirmed incidents of corruption.
Total number of confirmed incidents in which employees were dismissed or disciplined for corruption.
Total number of confirmed incidents when contracts with business partners were terminated or not renewed due to violations related to corruption.
Public legal cases regarding corruption brought against the organization or its employees during the reporting period and the outcomes of such cases.

title: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior, anti-trust, and monopoly practices
title_ko: 반경쟁 행위, 독점 금지 및 독점 관행과 관련된 법적 조치
description: The organization shall report the number of legal actions pending or completed during the reporting period regarding anti-competitive behavior and anti-trust/monopoly legislation violations, and the main outcomes of completed legal actions. (Source: GRI 206: Anti-competitive Behavior 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 계류 중이거나 완료된 반경쟁 행위 및 독점 금지/독점 관행 위반 관련 법적 조치의 수와, 완료된 법적 조치의 주요 결과를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 206: Anti-competitive Behavior 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Number of legal actions pending or completed during the reporting period regarding anti-competitive behavior and violations of anti-trust and monopoly legislation in which the organization has been identified as a participant.
Main outcomes of completed legal actions, including any decisions or judgements.

title: Approach to tax
description: The organization shall describe its approach to tax, including its tax strategy (or summary/abstract), the governance body/executive role for review/approval, the approach to regulatory compliance, and how the tax approach is linked to business and sustainable development strategies. (Source: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 세금 전략(또는 요약/초록), 검토/승인 책임이 있는 지배기구/임원직, 규제 준수 접근 방식, 그리고 세금 접근 방식이 비즈니스 및 지속 가능한 개발 전략과 어떻게 연결되는지 등을 포함하여 세금에 대한 접근 방식을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the approach to tax, including: tax strategy link (or summary/abstract); governance body/executive-level position for review/approval; approach to regulatory compliance; and linkage to business and sustainable development strategies.

title: Tax governance, control, and risk management
title_ko: 세금 거버넌스, 통제 및 위험 관리
description: The organization shall report a description of its tax governance and control framework, including accountability, embedding, risk management, and compliance evaluation. It must also describe mechanisms to raise concerns and the assurance process for tax disclosures. (Source: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 세금 거버넌스 및 통제 프레임워크(책임, 내재화, 위험 관리, 준수 평가 포함)에 대한 설명, 우려 제기 메커니즘, 세금 공시 보증 프로세스를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the tax governance and control framework, including: accountability; embedding; risk management; and compliance evaluation.
A description of the mechanisms to raise concerns about the organization's business conduct and integrity in relation to tax.
A description of the assurance process for disclosures on tax.

title: Stakeholder engagement and management of concerns related to tax
title_ko: 세금 관련 이해관계자 참여 및 우려 관리
description: The organization shall report its approach to stakeholder engagement and management of stakeholder concerns related to tax, including engagement with tax authorities, public policy advocacy on tax, and processes for collecting/considering stakeholder views. (Source: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 세금 관련 이해관계자 참여 및 우려 관리 접근 방식(세무 당국과의 참여, 세금 공공 정책 옹호, 이해관계자 의견 수렴 프로세스 포함)을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the approach to stakeholder engagement and management of stakeholder concerns related to tax, including: engagement with tax authorities; public policy advocacy on tax; processes for collecting and considering the views and concerns of stakeholders.

title: Country-by-country reporting
description: The organization shall report financial, economic, and tax-related information for each tax jurisdiction where its entities are resident, including: revenues, profit/loss before tax, taxes paid/accrued, number of employees, and tangible assets. (Source: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.12)
description_ko: 조직은 엔티티가 거주하는 모든 세금 관할 구역에 대해 수익, 세전 이익/손실, 납부/발생 세금, 직원 수, 유형 자산 등 재무, 경제 및 세금 관련 정보를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 207: Tax 2019, p.12)

required_disclosures.description: All tax jurisdictions where the entities included in the organization's audited consolidated financial statements, or in the financial information filed on public record, are resident for tax purposes.

For each tax jurisdiction, report: resident entities' names; primary activities; number of employees; revenues (third-party/intra-group); profit/loss before tax; tangible assets; corporate income tax paid/accrued; and reasons for difference between tax accrued and statutory tax rate.
The time period covered by the information reported in Disclosure 207-4.

title: Materials used by weight or volume
description: The organization shall report the total weight or volume of materials used to produce and package its primary products and services, broken down by non-renewable and renewable materials. (Source: GRI 301: Materials 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 주요 제품 및 서비스를 생산하고 포장하는 데 사용된 총 재료의 중량 또는 부피를 비재생 가능 재료와 재생 가능 재료로 구분하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 301: Materials 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total weight or volume of non-renewable materials used.
Total weight or volume of renewable materials used.

title: Recycled input materials used
description: The organization shall report the percentage of recycled input materials used to manufacture its primary products and services. (Source: GRI 301: Materials 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 주요 제품 및 서비스를 제조하는 데 사용된 재활용 투입 재료의 비율을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 301: Materials 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of recycled input materials used to manufacture the organization's primary products and services.

title: Reclaimed products and their packaging materials
description: The organization shall report the percentage of reclaimed products and their packaging materials for each product category and how the data for this disclosure have been collected. (Source: GRI 301: Materials 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 각 제품 범주별로 회수된 제품 및 포장재의 비율과 이 공시를 위한 데이터 수집 방법을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 301: Materials 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of reclaimed products and their packaging materials for each product category.
How the data for this disclosure have been collected.

title: Energy consumption within the organization
description: The organization shall report total fuel consumption and purchased/self-generated energy consumption within the organization, broken down by renewable and non-renewable sources and by type (fuel, electricity, heating, cooling, steam). (Source: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 조직 내 총 연료 소비량과 구매/자가 발전한 에너지 소비량을 재생 및 비재생 에너지원별, 유형별(연료, 전기, 난방, 냉방, 증기)로 구분하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total fuel consumption from non-renewable sources, in joules or multiples, and including fuel types used.
Total fuel consumption from renewable sources, in joules or multiples, and including fuel types used.
Total purchased electricity, heating, cooling, and steam consumption, in joules, watt-hours or multiples.
Total self-generated electricity, heating, cooling, and steam sold, in joules, watt-hours or multiples.
Total energy consumption within the organization, in joules or multiples.

title: Energy consumption outside of the organization
description: The organization shall report energy consumption outside the organization (Scope 3) in joules or multiples and the standards/methodologies used. This consumption occurs throughout the upstream and downstream activities of the value chain. (Source: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 조직 외부(가치 사슬)의 에너지 소비량(Scope 3)을 보고하고 사용된 표준/방법론을 보고해야 한다. 이는 상류 및 하류 활동 전반에 걸쳐 발생한다. (출처: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Energy consumption outside of the organization, in joules or multiples.
Standards, methodologies, assumptions, and/or calculation tools used.
Source of the conversion factors used.

title: Energy intensity
description: The organization shall report the energy intensity ratio (numerator: energy consumption in joules/multiples; denominator: organization-specific metric) and report the scope and types of energy consumption included. (Source: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 에너지 집약도 비율과 포함된 에너지 소비 범위 및 유형을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Energy intensity ratio for the organization.
Organization-specific metric (the denominator) chosen to calculate the ratio.
Types of energy included in the intensity ratio; whether fuel, electricity, heating, cooling, steam, or all.
Whether the ratio uses energy consumption within the organization, outside of it, or both.

title: Reduction of energy consumption
description: The organization shall report the amount of reductions in energy consumption achieved as a direct result of conservation and efficiency initiatives, the types of energy included, the basis for calculation (base year/baseline), and methodologies used. (Note: The GRI 103: Energy 2025 version replaced this with a focus on product/service reductions). (Source: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.14)
description_ko: 조직은 에너지 보존 및 효율성 이니셔티브의 직접적인 결과로 달성된 에너지 소비 절감량, 포함된 에너지 유형, 계산 기준(기준 연도/기준선), 사용된 방법론을 보고해야 한다. (참고: GRI 103: Energy 2025에서는 이 항목을 제품/서비스 절감에 대한 내용으로 대체함). (출처: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.14)

required_disclosures.description: Amount of reductions in energy consumption achieved as a direct result of conservation and efficiency initiatives, in joules or multiples.
Types of energy included in the reductions; whether fuel, electricity, heating, cooling, steam, or all.
Basis for calculating reductions in energy consumption, such as base year or baseline, including the rationale for choosing it.
Standards, methodologies, assumptions, and/or calculation tools used.

title: Reductions in energy requirements of products and services
title_ko: 제품 및 서비스의 에너지 요구 사항 절감
description: The organization shall report reductions in energy requirements of sold products and services achieved during the reporting period, the basis for calculation (base year/baseline), and methodologies used. (Source: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.15)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 달성된 판매된 제품 및 서비스의 에너지 요구 사항 절감량, 계산 기준(기준 연도/기준선), 사용된 방법론을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 302: Energy 2016, p.15)

required_disclosures.description: Reductions in energy requirements of sold products and services achieved during the reporting period, in joules or multiples.
Basis for calculating reductions in energy consumption, such as base year or baseline, including the rationale for choosing it.
Standards, methodologies, assumptions, and/or calculation tools used.

title: Interactions with water as a shared resource
description: The organization shall describe how it interacts with water (withdrawal, consumption, discharge), the water-related impacts it has caused or contributed to, the approach used to identify these impacts, and the process for setting water-related goals/targets. (Source: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 물과의 상호작용(취수, 소비, 방류), 물 관련 영향, 영향 식별 접근 방식, 물 관련 목표/대상 설정 프로세스를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: A description of how the organization interacts with water, including how and where water is withdrawn, consumed, and discharged, and the water-related impacts the organization has caused or contributed to, or that are directly linked to its operations, products, or services by its business relationships.
A description of the approach used to identify water-related impacts, including the scope of assessments, their timeframe, and any tools or methodologies used.

A description of how water-related impacts are addressed, including how the organization works with stakeholders to steward water as a shared resource, and how it engages with suppliers or customers with significant water-related impacts.

An explanation of the process for setting any water-related goals and targets that are part of the organization's approach to managing water and effluents, and how they relate to public policy and the local context of each area with water stress.

title: Management of water discharge-related impacts
description: The organization shall report a description of any minimum standards set for the quality of effluent discharge, how these standards were determined (including consideration of the receiving waterbody profile), and any sector-specific standards considered. (Source: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 유출수 방류 수질에 대해 설정된 최소 표준 및 이 표준이 어떻게 결정되었는지(수용 수역 프로필 고려 포함), 그리고 고려된 섹터별 표준을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: A description of any minimum standards set for the quality of effluent discharge, and how these minimum standards were determined, including: standards for locations with no local discharge requirements; any internally developed water quality standards; any sector-specific standards; and whether the profile of the receiving waterbody was considered.

title: Water withdrawal
description: The organization shall report total water withdrawal from all areas (in megaliters) and in areas with water stress, with a breakdown by source (surface water, groundwater, seawater, produced water, third-party water) and by quality (freshwater or other water). (Source: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 모든 지역 및 물 스트레스 지역의 총 물 취수량(메가리터), 취수원별(지표수, 지하수, 해수, 생산수, 제3자 물) 및 수질별(담수 또는 기타 수) 세부 내역을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Total water withdrawal from all areas in megaliters, and a breakdown of this total by the following sources: Surface water; Groundwater; Seawater; Produced water; Third-party water.
Total water withdrawal from all areas with water stress in megaliters, and a breakdown of this total by the following sources.

A breakdown of total water withdrawal from each of the sources listed in Disclosures 303-3-a and 303-3-b in megaliters by the following categories: Freshwater (≤1,000 mg/L Total Dissolved Solids); Other water (>1,000 mg/L Total Dissolved Solids).
Any contextual information necessary to understand how the data have been compiled, such as any standards, methodologies, and assumptions used.

title: Water discharge
description: The organization shall report total water discharge to all areas (in megaliters) and to areas with water stress, with a breakdown by destination and by quality (freshwater or other water). It must also report priority substances of concern for which discharges are treated and the number of non-compliance incidents. (Source: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 모든 지역 및 물 스트레스 지역의 총 물 방류량(메가리터), 방류 목적지별 및 수질별 세부 내역을 보고해야 한다. 또한, 처리되는 우선 우려 물질과 규정 미준수 사건 수를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Total water discharge to all areas in megaliters, and a breakdown of this total by the following types of destination: Surface water; Groundwater; Seawater; Third-party water.
A breakdown of total water discharge to all areas in megaliters by the following categories: Freshwater (≤1,000 mg/L Total Dissolved Solids); Other water (>1,000 mg/L Total Dissolved Solids).

Total water discharge to all areas with water stress in megaliters, and a breakdown of this total by the following categories: Freshwater (≤1,000 mg/L Total Dissolved Solids); Other water (>1,000 mg/L Total Dissolved Solids).

Priority substances of concern for which discharges are treated, including: how priority substances of concern were defined; approach for setting discharge limits; and number of incidents of non-compliance with discharge limits.
Any contextual information necessary to understand how the data have been compiled, such as any standards, methodologies, and assumptions used.

title: Water consumption
description: The organization shall report total water consumption from all areas and in areas with water stress (in megaliters) and report the change in water storage if water storage has been identified as having a significant water-related impact. (Source: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.16)
description_ko: 조직은 모든 지역 및 물 스트레스 지역의 총 물 소비량(메가리터)과, 물 저장량이 중대한 물 관련 영향을 미치는 것으로 식별된 경우 물 저장량의 변화를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: Total water consumption from all areas in megaliters.
Total water consumption from all areas with water stress in megaliters.
Change in water storage in megaliters, if water storage has been identified as having a significant water-related impact.
Any contextual information necessary to understand how the data have been compiled, such as any standards, methodologies, and assumptions used.

title: Operational sites in or near protected areas and high biodiversity value areas
title_ko: 보호 지역 및 높은 생물 다양성 가치를 지닌 지역에 있거나 인접한 운영 현장
description: The organization shall report information for each operational site owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas, including geographic location, position, type of operation, size, and biodiversity value attributes. (Source: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 보호 지역 및 보호 지역 외 높은 생물 다양성 가치를 지닌 지역에 있거나 인접한 모든 운영 현장에 대해 지리적 위치, 관련 위치, 운영 유형, 크기 및 생물 다양성 가치 속성을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: For each operational site owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas, report: Geographic location; Subsurface/underground land managed; Position in relation to the protected/high biodiversity area; Type of operation; Size of operational site; Biodiversity value characterized by area attributes; and Biodiversity value characterized by protected status listing.

title: Significant impacts of activities, products and services on biodiversity
title_ko: 활동, 제품 및 서비스가 생물 다양성에 미치는 중대한 영향
description: The organization shall report the nature of significant direct and indirect impacts on biodiversity (e.g., habitat conversion, pollution, invasive species) and the significant positive and negative impacts with reference to species affected, area impacted, duration, and reversibility/irreversibility. (Source: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 생물 다양성에 미치는 중대한 직접적 및 간접적 영향의 성격(서식지 전환, 오염, 외래종 등)과, 영향을 받은 종, 면적, 기간 및 영향의 가역성/비가역성을 참조하여 중대한 긍정적 및 부정적 영향을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Nature of significant direct and indirect impacts on biodiversity with reference to one or more of the following: Infrastructure; Pollution; Invasive species; Species reduction; Habitat conversion; Changes in ecological processes.
Significant direct and indirect positive and negative impacts with reference to: Species affected; Extent of areas impacted; Duration of impacts; Reversibility or irreversibility of the impacts.

title: Habitats protected or restored
description: The organization shall report the size and location of all habitat areas protected or restored, external approval of success, partnerships with third parties for protection/restoration, and the status of each area's condition at the close of the reporting period. (Source: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 보호되거나 복구된 모든 서식지 면적과 위치, 복구 성공에 대한 독립적인 외부 전문가의 승인 여부, 제3자와의 파트너십, 보고 기간 말의 각 서식지 상태를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Size and location of all habitat areas protected or restored, and whether the success of the restoration measure was or is approved by independent external professionals.
Whether partnerships exist with third parties to protect or restore habitat areas distinct from where the organization has overseen and implemented restoration or protection measures.
Status of each area based on its condition at the close of the reporting period.

title: IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by operations
title_ko: IUCN Red List 종 및 운영의 영향을 받는 지역의 서식지를 가진 국가 보존 목록 종
description: The organization shall report the total number of IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by the organization's operations, by level of extinction risk (Critically endangered, Endangered, Vulnerable, etc.). (Source: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 IUCN Red List 종 및 운영의 영향을 받는 지역의 서식지를 가진 국가 보존 목록 종의 총 수(멸종 위험 수준별로 구분)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by the operations of the organization, by level of extinction risk.

title: Direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report Gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent, along with gases included, base year, emission factors, and consolidation approach. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 직접 배출된 온실가스 총량(이산화탄소 환산톤), 포함된 가스, 기준 연도, 배출 계수 및 통합 접근방식 등을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Gross direct (Scope 1) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.

examples: Our company’s direct emissions from owned facilities totaled 1,200 tCO2e in 2024.

title: Energy indirect (Scope 2) GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report gross location-based and, if applicable, market-based energy indirect (Scope 2) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 위치 기반(location-based) 및 해당될 경우 시장 기반(market-based) 에너지 간접(Scope 2) 온실가스 총량(이산화탄소 환산톤)을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Gross location-based energy indirect (Scope 2) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.
If applicable, gross market-based energy indirect (Scope 2) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.

title: Other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report gross other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions and categories/activities included in the calculation. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 기타 간접(Scope 3) 온실가스 총량과 계산에 포함된 범주 및 활동을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Gross other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.
Other indirect (Scope 3) GHG emissions categories and activities included in the calculation.

title: GHG emissions intensity
description: The organization shall report the GHG emissions intensity ratio, the organization-specific metric used, and the types of GHG emissions included. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.16)
description_ko: 조직은 온실가스 배출량 집약도 비율, 사용된 조직별 특정 지표, 포함된 온실가스 배출량 유형을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: GHG emissions intensity ratio for the organization.
Organization-specific metric (the denominator) chosen to calculate the ratio.

title: Reduction of GHG emissions
description: The organization shall report GHG emissions reduced as a direct result of reduction initiatives, scopes in which reductions took place, and base year/baseline used. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.17)
description_ko: 조직은 감축 이니셔티브의 직접적인 결과로 줄어든 온실가스 배출량, 감축이 발생한 범위, 사용된 기준 연도/기준선을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.17)

required_disclosures.description: GHG emissions reduced as a direct result of reduction initiatives, in metric tons of CO2 equivalent.
Scopes in which reductions took place; whether direct (Scope 1), energy indirect (Scope 2), and/or other indirect (Scope 3).

title: Emissions of ozone-depleting substances (ODS)
description: The organization shall report production, imports, and exports of ODS in metric tons of CFC-11 (trichlorofluoromethane) equivalent. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.19)
description_ko: 조직은 오존층 파괴 물질의 생산, 수입, 수출을 CFC-11(트리클로로플루오로메탄) 환산톤으로 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.19)

required_disclosures.description: Production, imports, and exports of ODS in metric tons of CFC-11 (trichlorofluoromethane) equivalent.

title: Nitrogen oxides (NOx), sulfur oxides (SOx), and other significant air emissions
title_ko: 질소 산화물(NOx), 황 산화물(SOx) 및 기타 유의미한 대기 배출량
description: The organization shall report significant air emissions (NOx, SOx, POP, VOC, HAP, PM, etc.) in kilograms or multiples. (Source: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.21)
description_ko: 조직은 유의미한 대기 배출량(NOx, SOx, POP, VOC, HAP, PM 등)을 킬로그램 또는 그 배수로 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 305: Emissions 2016, p.21)

required_disclosures.description: Significant air emissions, in kilograms or multiples, for each of the following: NOX, SOX, Persistent organic pollutants (POP), Volatile organic compounds (VOC), Hazardous air pollutants (HAP), Particulate matter (PM), Other standard categories of air emissions identified in relevant regulations.

title: Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts
title_ko: 폐기물 발생 및 중대한 폐기물 관련 영향
description: The organization shall describe its significant actual and potential waste-related impacts, including the inputs, activities, and outputs that lead to these impacts, and whether the impacts relate to waste generated in the organization's own activities or to waste generated upstream or downstream in its value chain. (Source: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 중대한 실제 및 잠재적 폐기물 관련 영향(원인이 되는 투입물, 활동, 산출물 포함)과, 이 영향이 조직 자체 활동 또는 가치 사슬 상류/하류에서 발생하는 폐기물과 관련되는지 여부를 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: For the organization's significant actual and potential waste-related impacts, a description of: the inputs, activities, and outputs that lead or could lead to these impacts; whether these impacts relate to waste generated in the organization's own activities or to waste generated upstream or downstream in its value chain.
The reporting organization should report a process flow of inputs, activities, and outputs that lead or could lead to significant waste-related impacts. (Recommendation)

title: Management of significant waste-related impacts
description: The organization shall report actions, including circularity measures, taken to prevent waste generation and to manage significant impacts from waste generated, management processes for third-party handled waste, and processes for collecting/monitoring waste data. (Source: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 폐기물 발생 방지 및 중대한 폐기물 관련 영향을 관리하기 위해 취한 조치(순환 경제 조치 포함), 제3자 관리 폐기물에 대한 프로세스, 폐기물 데이터 수집/모니터링 프로세스를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Actions, including circularity measures, taken to prevent waste generation in the organization's own activities and upstream and downstream in its value chain, and to manage significant impacts from waste generated.

If the waste generated by the organization in its own activities is managed by a third party, a description of the processes used to determine whether the third party manages the waste in line with contractual or legislative obligations.
The processes used to collect and monitor waste-related data.

title: Waste generated
description: The organization shall report the total weight of waste generated in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by composition of the waste (hazardous and non-hazardous). (Source: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.12)
description_ko: 조직은 총 발생된 폐기물 무게(톤)와 폐기물 구성(유해/비유해 폐기물)별 세부 내역을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.12)

required_disclosures.description: Total weight of waste generated in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by composition of the waste.
When compiling, exclude effluent (unless required by national legislation) and use 1000 kilograms as the measure for a metric ton.

title: Waste diverted from disposal
description: The organization shall report the total weight of waste diverted from disposal (in metric tons), and a breakdown of this total by composition (hazardous/non-hazardous) and by recovery operations (preparation for reuse, recycling, other recovery operations), separated by onsite and offsite management. (Source: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 처분에서 전환된 폐기물의 총 무게(톤), 구성(유해/비유해) 및 회수 작업(재사용 준비, 재활용, 기타 회수 작업)별 세부 내역을 보고하고, 현장 및 외부 관리를 구분해야 한다. (출처: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: Total weight of waste diverted from disposal in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by composition of the waste.
Total weight of hazardous waste diverted from disposal in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by recovery operations.
Total weight of non-hazardous waste diverted from disposal in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by recovery operations.
For each recovery operation, a breakdown of the total weight in metric tons of hazardous and non-hazardous waste diverted from disposal: onsite; offsite.
The reporting organization should report the total weight of waste prevented, and the baseline and methodology for this calculation. (Recommendation)

title: Waste directed to disposal
description: The organization shall report the total weight of waste directed to disposal (in metric tons), and a breakdown of this total by composition (hazardous/non-hazardous) and by disposal operations (incineration, landfilling, other disposal), separated by onsite and offsite disposal. (Source: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.15)
description_ko: 조직은 처분으로 향한 총 폐기물 무게(톤), 구성(유해/비유해) 및 처분 작업(소각, 매립 등)별 세부 내역을 보고하고, 현장 및 외부 처분을 구분해야 한다. (출처: GRI 306: Waste 2020, p.15)

required_disclosures.description: Total weight of waste directed to disposal in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by composition of the waste.
Total weight of hazardous waste directed to disposal in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by the disposal operations.
Total weight of non-hazardous waste directed to disposal in metric tons, and a breakdown of this total by the disposal operations.
For each disposal operation, a breakdown of the total weight in metric tons of hazardous and non-hazardous waste directed to disposal: onsite; offsite.

title: New suppliers that were screened using environmental criteria
title_ko: 환경 기준을 사용하여 심사된 신규 공급업체
description: The organization shall report the percentage of new suppliers that were screened using environmental criteria. This disclosure measures the extent of due diligence implementation for environmental impacts in the supply chain. (Source: GRI 308: Supplier Environmental Assessment 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 환경 기준을 사용하여 심사된 신규 공급업체의 비율을 보고해야 한다. 이 공시는 공급망 환경 영향에 대한 실사(due diligence) 이행 정도를 측정한다. (출처: GRI 308: Supplier Environmental Assessment 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of new suppliers that were screened using environmental criteria.

title: Negative environmental impacts in the supply chain and actions taken
title_ko: 공급망 내 부정적인 환경 영향 및 취해진 조치
description: The organization shall report the number and percentage of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative environmental impacts in the supply chain, the impacts identified, and the percentage of suppliers with agreed improvements or terminated relationships. (Source: GRI 308: Supplier Environmental Assessment 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 공급망에서 중대한 실제 및 잠재적 부정적인 환경 영향이 있다고 식별된 공급업체의 수와 비율, 식별된 영향, 그리고 개선 합의 또는 관계가 종료된 공급업체의 비율을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 308: Supplier Environmental Assessment 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Number of suppliers assessed for environmental impacts.
Number of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative environmental impacts.
Significant actual and potential negative environmental impacts identified in the supply chain.
Percentage of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative environmental impacts with which improvements were agreed upon as a result of assessment.
Percentage of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative environmental impacts with which relationships were terminated as a result of assessment, and why.

title: New employee hires and employee turnover
title_ko: 신규 직원 채용 및 직원 이직률
description: The organization shall report the total number and rate of new employee hires and employee turnover during the reporting period, broken down by age group, gender, and region. (Source: GRI 401: Employment 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 신규 직원 채용 및 직원 이직의 총 수와 비율을 연령 그룹, 성별 및 지역별로 분류하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 401: Employment 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total number and rate of new employee hires during the reporting period, by age group, gender and region.
Total number and rate of employee turnover during the reporting period, by age group, gender and region.

title: Benefits provided to full-time employees that are not provided to temporary or part-time employees
title_ko: 정규직 직원에게 제공되지만 임시직 또는 시간제 직원에게는 제공되지 않는 복리 후생
description: The organization shall report standard benefits (e.g., life insurance, health care, disability coverage, parental leave, retirement provision) provided to full-time employees that are not provided to temporary or part-time employees, by significant locations of operation. (Source: GRI 401: Employment 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 정규직 직원에게는 제공되지만 임시직 또는 시간제 직원에게는 제공되지 않는 표준 복리 후생(예: 생명 보험, 건강 관리 등)을 주요 사업장별로 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 401: Employment 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Benefits which are standard for full-time employees of the organization but are not provided to temporary or part-time employees, by significant locations of operation. These include, as a minimum: life insurance; health care; disability and invalidity coverage; parental leave; retirement provision; stock ownership; and others.
The definition used for 'significant locations of operation'.

title: Parental leave
description: The organization shall report the total number of employees entitled to and who took parental leave, those who returned to work after leave, and the return to work and retention rates, all broken down by gender. (Source: GRI 401: Employment 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 육아 휴직 자격이 있는 직원 및 휴직을 사용한 직원의 총 수, 복직한 직원 수, 복직률 및 유지율을 성별로 분류하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 401: Employment 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of employees that were entitled to parental leave, by gender.
Total number of employees that took parental leave, by gender.
Total number of employees that returned to work in the reporting period after parental leave ended, by gender.
Total number of employees that returned to work after parental leave ended that were still employed 12 months after their return to work, by gender.
Return to work and retention rates of employees that took parental leave, by gender.

title: Minimum notice periods regarding operational changes
title_ko: 운영 변화와 관련된 최소 통지 기간
description: The organization shall report the minimum number of weeks' notice typically provided to employees and their representatives prior to the implementation of significant operational changes that could substantially affect them. It must also report whether the notice period and consultation/negotiation provisions are specified in collective agreements. (Source: GRI 402: Labor/Management Relations 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 직원 및 그 대표자들에게 중대한 운영 변화 시행 전에 일반적으로 제공되는 최소 통지 기간(주)을 보고해야 하며, 단체 협약에 통지 기간 및 협의/교섭 조항이 명시되어 있는지 여부도 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 402: Labor/Management Relations 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Minimum number of weeks' notice typically provided to employees and their representatives prior to the implementation of significant operational changes that could substantially affect them.
For organizations with collective bargaining agreements, report whether the notice period and provisions for consultation and negotiation are specified in collective agreements.

title: Occupational health and safety management system
title_ko: 산업 보건 및 안전 관리 시스템
description: The organization shall report whether an OHS management system has been implemented (based on legal requirements and/or recognized standards) and describe the scope of workers, activities, and workplaces covered by the system. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 OHS 관리 시스템의 시행 여부(법적 요구사항 및/또는 인정된 표준 기반)를 보고하고, 시스템이 적용되는 작업자, 활동, 작업장의 범위를 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: A statement of whether an occupational health and safety management system has been implemented, including legal requirements and/or recognized standards.

A description of the scope of workers, activities, and workplaces covered by the occupational health and safety management system, and an explanation of whether and, if so, why any workers, activities, or workplaces are not covered.

title: Hazard identification, risk assessment, and incident investigation
title_ko: 위험원 식별, 위험 평가 및 사건 조사
description: The organization shall describe the processes used to identify hazards and assess risks (routine/non-routine) using the hierarchy of controls, the processes for workers to report hazards (with protection against reprisals), the policies for workers to remove themselves from work, and the processes used to investigate work-related incidents. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 위험원 식별/위험 평가 프로세스(통제 계층 적용), 근로자의 위험원 보고 프로세스(보복 방지 포함), 위험 작업장 이탈 정책, 업무상 사고 조사 프로세스를 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the processes used to identify work-related hazards and assess risks on a routine and non-routine basis, and to apply the hierarchy of controls.
A description of the processes for workers to report work-related hazards and hazardous situations, and an explanation of how workers are protected against reprisals.

A description of the policies and processes for workers to remove themselves from work situations that they believe could cause injury or ill health, and an explanation of how workers are protected against reprisals.

A description of the processes used to investigate work-related incidents, including the processes to identify hazards and assess risks relating to the incidents, to determine corrective actions using the hierarchy of controls, and to determine improvements needed in the OHS management system.

title: Occupational health services
description: The organization shall describe the functions of the occupational health services that contribute to hazard elimination/risk minimization, and how the organization ensures the quality of these services and facilitates workers' access to them. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.12)
description_ko: 조직은 위험 제거/최소화에 기여하는 산업 보건 서비스의 기능을 설명하고, 이러한 서비스의 품질을 보장하고 근로자의 접근을 촉진하는 방법을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.12)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the occupational health services' functions that contribute to the identification and elimination of hazards and minimization of risks, and an explanation of how the organization ensures the quality of these services and facilitates workers' access to them.

title: Worker participation, consultation, and communication on occupational health and safety
title_ko: 산업 보건 및 안전 관련 작업자 참여, 협의 및 소통
description: The organization shall report a description of the processes for worker participation and consultation in the OHS management system, and for communicating relevant OHS information. If formal joint management-worker OHS committees exist, describe their responsibilities, frequency, decision-making authority, and unrepresented workers. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.13)
description_ko: 조직은 OHS 관리 시스템에서 작업자 참여 및 협의 프로세스, OHS 정보 소통 프로세스를 설명해야 한다. 공식적인 노사합동 OHS 위원회가 있는 경우, 책임, 회의 빈도, 의사 결정 권한 및 미대표된 작업자를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.13)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the processes for worker participation and consultation in the development, implementation, and evaluation of the OHS management system, and for providing access to and communicating relevant information on OHS to workers.

Where formal joint management-worker health and safety committees exist, a description of their responsibilities, meeting frequency, decision-making authority, and whether and, if so, why any workers are not represented by these committees.

title: Worker training on occupational health and safety
title_ko: 산업 보건 및 안전 관련 작업자 훈련
description: The organization shall report a description of any OHS training provided to workers, including generic and specific training on work-related hazards, hazardous activities, or hazardous situations. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.15)
description_ko: 조직은 작업자에게 제공된 OHS 훈련(일반 훈련 및 특정 업무 관련 위험 훈련 포함)을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.15)

required_disclosures.description: A description of any occupational health and safety training provided to workers, including generic training as well as training on specific work-related hazards, hazardous activities, or hazardous situations.

title: Promotion of worker health
description: The organization shall report an explanation of how it facilitates workers' access to non-occupational medical and healthcare services, and a description of any voluntary health promotion services and programs offered to workers for non-work-related health risks. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.16)
description_ko: 조직은 작업자의 비업무상 의료 및 건강 관리 서비스 접근성을 촉진하는 방법, 비업무상 건강 위험을 다루기 위해 제공되는 자발적 건강 증진 서비스 및 프로그램의 설명을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.16)

required_disclosures.description: An explanation of how the organization facilitates workers' access to non-occupational medical and healthcare services, and the scope of access provided.

A description of any voluntary health promotion services and programs offered to workers to address major non-work-related health risks, including the specific health risks addressed, and how the organization facilitates workers' access to these services and programs.

title: Prevention and mitigation of occupational health and safety impacts directly linked by business relationships
title_ko: 비즈니스 관계에 의해 직접적으로 연결된 산업 보건 및 안전 영향의 예방 및 완화
description: The organization shall report a description of its approach to preventing or mitigating significant negative OHS impacts that are directly linked to its operations, products, or services by its business relationships, and the related hazards and risks. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.18)
description_ko: 조직은 비즈니스 관계에 의해 조직의 운영, 제품 또는 서비스와 직접적으로 연결된 중대한 부정적 OHS 영향 및 관련 위험을 예방 또는 완화하기 위한 접근 방식을 설명해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.18)

required_disclosures.description: A description of the organization's approach to preventing or mitigating significant negative occupational health and safety impacts that are directly linked to its operations, products, or services by its business relationships, and the related hazards and risks.

title: Workers covered by an occupational health and safety management system
title_ko: 산업 보건 및 안전 관리 시스템이 적용되는 작업자
description: The organization shall report the number and percentage of all workers (employees and controlled non-employees) covered by an OHS management system (legal/recognized standards based), the percentage covered by an internally audited system, and the percentage covered by an externally audited/certified system. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.19)
description_ko: 조직은 OHS 관리 시스템(법적/인정된 표준 기반)이 적용되는 모든 작업자(직원 및 통제 하의 비고용인)의 수와 비율, 내부 감사 시스템이 적용되는 비율, 외부 감사/인증 시스템이 적용되는 비율을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.19)

required_disclosures.description: If the organization has implemented an OHS management system based on legal requirements and/or recognized standards/guidelines: report the number and percentage of all employees and controlled non-employees covered by such a system, an internally audited system, and an externally audited/certified system.
Whether and, if so, why any workers have been excluded from this disclosure, including the types of worker excluded.
Any contextual information necessary to understand how the data have been compiled.

title: Work-related injuries
description: The organization shall report the number and rate of fatalities, high-consequence work-related injuries, and recordable work-related injuries for employees and controlled non-employees, along with the main types of injury and the processes to manage high-consequence injury risks. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.21)
description_ko: 조직은 직원 및 통제 하의 비고용인에 대한 업무상 사망, 고위험 업무상 상해, 기록 가능한 업무상 상해의 수와 비율, 주요 상해 유형, 고위험 상해 위험 관리 프로세스를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.21)

required_disclosures.description: For all employees: The number and rate of fatalities, high-consequence work-related injuries (excluding fatalities), and recordable work-related injuries; The main types of work-related injury; The number of hours worked.

For all controlled non-employees: The number and rate of fatalities, high-consequence work-related injuries (excluding fatalities), and recordable work-related injuries; The main types of work-related injury; The number of hours worked.

The work-related hazards that pose a risk of high-consequence injury, including: how determined; which hazards caused/contributed to injuries; and actions taken or underway to eliminate these hazards using the hierarchy of controls.
Whether the rates have been calculated based on 200,000 or 1,000,000 hours worked.

title: Work-related ill health
description: The organization shall report the number of fatalities and cases of recordable work-related ill health for employees and controlled non-employees, the main types of ill health, and the work-related hazards that pose a risk of ill health. (Source: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.25)
description_ko: 조직은 직원 및 통제 하의 비고용인에 대한 업무상 사망 및 기록 가능한 업무상 질병의 수, 주요 질병 유형, 질병 위험을 초래하는 업무 관련 위험원을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018, p.25)

required_disclosures.description: For all employees: The number of fatalities, number of cases of recordable work-related ill health, and the main types of work-related ill health.
For all controlled non-employees: The number of fatalities, number of cases of recordable work-related ill health, and the main types of work-related ill health.

The work-related hazards that pose a risk of ill health, including: how determined; which hazards caused/contributed to ill health; and actions taken or underway to eliminate these hazards using the hierarchy of controls.
Whether and, if so, why any workers have been excluded from this disclosure, including the types of worker excluded.

title: Average hours of training per year per employee
description: The organization shall report the average hours of training that its employees have undertaken during the reporting period, broken down by gender and employee category. (Source: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 직원이 받은 평균 훈련 시간을 성별 및 직원 범주별로 분류하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Average hours of training that the organization's employees have undertaken during the reporting period, by: gender; employee category.

title: Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance programs
title_ko: 직원 기술 향상 프로그램 및 전환 지원 프로그램
description: The organization shall report the type and scope of programs implemented and assistance provided to upgrade employee skills, and transition assistance programs provided to facilitate continued employability and management of career endings. (Source: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 직원 기술 향상을 위해 시행된 프로그램의 유형 및 범위와 제공된 지원, 지속적인 고용 가능성 및 경력 종료 관리를 위한 전환 지원 프로그램을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Type and scope of programs implemented and assistance provided to upgrade employee skills.
Transition assistance programs provided to facilitate continued employability and the management of career endings resulting from retirement or termination of employment.

title: Percentage of employees receiving regular performance and career development reviews
title_ko: 정기적인 성과 및 경력 개발 평가를 받는 직원 비율
description: The organization shall report the percentage of total employees by gender and by employee category who received a regular performance and career development review during the reporting period. (Source: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016, p.11)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 정기적인 성과 및 경력 개발 평가를 받은 총 직원의 비율을 성별 및 직원 범주별로 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016, p.11)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of total employees by gender and by employee category who received a regular performance and career development review during the reporting period.

title: Diversity of governance bodies and employees
description: The organization shall report the percentage of individuals within its governance bodies and employees (by employee category) in each of the following diversity categories: Gender; Age group; Other indicators of diversity. (Source: GRI 405: Diversity and Equal Opportunity 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 다음 다양성 범주별로 지배기구 구성원 및 직원(직원 범주별)의 비율을 보고해야 한다: 성별; 연령 그룹; 기타 관련 다양성 지표. (출처: GRI 405: Diversity and Equal Opportunity 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of individuals within the organization's governance bodies in each of the following diversity categories: Gender; Age group; Other indicators of diversity.
Percentage of employees per employee category in each of the following diversity categories: Gender; Age group; Other indicators of diversity.

title: Ratio of basic salary and remuneration of women to men
title_ko: 여성 대 남성의 기본 급여 및 보수 비율
description: The organization shall report the ratio of the basic salary and remuneration of women to men for each employee category, by significant locations of operation, using base remuneration on the average pay of each gender grouping within each employee category. (Source: GRI 405: Diversity and Equal Opportunity 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 각 직원 범주별, 주요 사업장별로 여성 대 남성의 기본 급여 및 보수 비율을 보고해야 한다. 비율은 각 성별 그룹의 평균 급여를 기준으로 한다. (출처: GRI 405: Diversity and Equal Opportunity 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Ratio of the basic salary and remuneration of women to men for each employee category, by significant locations of operation.
The definition used for 'significant locations of operation'.

title: Incidents of discrimination and corrective actions taken
title_ko: 차별 사건 및 취해진 시정 조치
description: The organization shall report the total number of incidents of discrimination during the reporting period and the status of the incidents and actions taken (reviewed, remediation implemented, results reviewed, incident no longer subject to action). (Source: GRI 406: Non-discrimination 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 발생한 차별 사건의 총 수와 사건의 상태 및 취해진 조치(검토, 시정 조치 이행, 결과 검토, 더 이상 조치 대상이 아닌 사건)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 406: Non-discrimination 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of incidents of discrimination during the reporting period.

Status of the incidents and actions taken with reference to the following: Incident reviewed by the organization; Remediation plans being implemented; Remediation plans that have been implemented, with results reviewed through routine internal management review processes; Incident no longer subject to action.

title: Operations and suppliers in which the right to freedom of association and collective bargaining may be at risk
title_ko: 결사의 자유 및 단체 교섭 권리가 위험에 처할 수 있는 운영 부문 및 공급업체
description: The organization shall report operations and suppliers in which workers' rights to exercise freedom of association or collective bargaining may be violated or at significant risk, in terms of country/geographic area and type of operation/supplier. It must also report measures taken to support these rights. (Source: GRI 407: Freedom of Association and Collective Bargaining 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 결사의 자유 또는 단체 교섭 권리가 침해되거나 심각한 위험에 처할 수 있는 운영 부문 및 공급업체를 국가/지리적 영역 및 운영/공급업체 유형별로 보고하고, 이러한 권리를 지원하기 위해 취한 조치를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 407: Freedom of Association and Collective Bargaining 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Operations and suppliers in which workers' rights to exercise freedom of association or collective bargaining may be violated or at significant risk either in terms of: type of operation (such as manufacturing plant) and supplier; countries or geographic areas with operations and suppliers considered at risk.
Measures taken by the organization in the reporting period intended to support rights to exercise freedom of association and collective bargaining.

title: Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of child labor
title_ko: 아동 노동 사건의 상당한 위험이 있는 운영 부문 및 공급업체
description: The organization shall report operations and suppliers considered to have significant risk for incidents of child labor and young workers exposed to hazardous work, in terms of type of operation/supplier and countries/geographic areas. It must also report measures taken to abolish child labor. (Source: GRI 408: Child Labor 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 아동 노동 및 유해 작업에 노출된 청소년 근로자 사건의 '상당한 위험'이 있는 운영 부문 및 공급업체를 운영 유형 및 국가/지역별로 보고하고, 아동 노동의 효과적인 폐지를 위해 취한 조치를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 408: Child Labor 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Operations and suppliers considered to have significant risk for incidents of: child labor; young workers exposed to hazardous work.

Operations and suppliers considered to have significant risk for incidents of child labor either in terms of: type of operation (such as manufacturing plant) and supplier; countries or geographic areas with operations and suppliers considered at risk.
Measures taken by the organization in the reporting period intended to contribute to the effective abolition of child labor.

title: Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of forced or compulsory labor
title_ko: 강제 또는 의무 노동 사건의 상당한 위험이 있는 운영 부문 및 공급업체
description: The organization shall report operations and suppliers considered to have significant risk for incidents of forced or compulsory labor, in terms of type of operation/supplier and countries/geographic areas. It must also report measures taken to eliminate all forms of forced or compulsory labor. (Source: GRI 409: Forced or Compulsory Labor 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 강제 또는 의무 노동 사건의 '상당한 위험'이 있는 운영 부문 및 공급업체를 운영 유형 및 국가/지역별로 보고하고, 모든 형태의 강제 또는 의무 노동 근절에 기여하기 위해 취한 조치를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 409: Forced or Compulsory Labor 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Operations and suppliers considered to have significant risk for incidents of forced or compulsory labor, in terms of: type of operation (such as manufacturing plant) and supplier; countries or geographic areas with operations and suppliers considered at risk.
Measures taken by the organization in the reporting period intended to contribute to the elimination of all forms of forced or compulsory labor.

title: Security personnel trained in human rights policies or procedures
title_ko: 인권 정책 또는 절차에 대해 훈련받은 보안 인력
description: The organization shall report the percentage of security personnel (employees and third-party) who have received formal training in the organization's human rights policies or specific procedures and their application to security. (Source: GRI 410: Security Practices 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 조직의 인권 정책 또는 특정 절차 및 보안 적용에 대해 공식적인 훈련을 받은 보안 인력(직원 및 제3자)의 비율을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 410: Security Practices 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of security personnel who have received formal training in the organization's human rights policies or specific procedures and their application to security.
Whether training requirements also apply to third-party organizations providing security personnel.

title: Incidents of violations involving rights of indigenous peoples
description: The organization shall report the total number of identified incidents of violations involving the rights of indigenous peoples during the reporting period, and the status/actions taken (review, remediation). (Source: GRI 411: Rights of Indigenous Peoples 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 확인된 원주민 권리 침해 사건의 총 수와 사건의 상태 및 취해진 조치(검토, 시정 조치)를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 411: Rights of Indigenous Peoples 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of identified incidents of violations involving the rights of indigenous peoples during the reporting period.

Status of the incidents and actions taken with reference to the following: Incident reviewed by the organization; Remediation plans being implemented; Remediation plans that have been implemented, with results reviewed through routine internal management review processes; Incident no longer subject to action.

title: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
title_ko: 지역 사회 참여, 영향 평가 및 개발 프로그램이 있는 운영 부문
description: The organization shall report the percentage of operations with implemented local community engagement, impact assessments (social/environmental), and/or community development programs, including the use of formal local community grievance processes. (Source: GRI 413: Local Communities 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 지역 사회 참여, 영향 평가(사회적/환경적) 및/또는 지역 사회 개발 프로그램이 시행된 운영 부문의 비율을 보고해야 한다. 여기에는 공식적인 지역 사회 고충 처리 절차의 사용이 포함된다. (출처: GRI 413: Local Communities 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of operations with implemented local community engagement, impact assessments, and/or development programs, including the use of: social impact assessments; environmental impact assessments and ongoing monitoring; public disclosure of results; local community development programs; broad based local community consultation committees; works councils/OHS committees; and formal local community grievance processes.

title: Operations with significant actual and potential negative impacts on local communities
title_ko: 지역 사회에 중대한 실제 및 잠재적 부정적 영향이 있는 운영 부문
description: The organization shall report the operations with significant actual and potential negative impacts on local communities, including the location, the significant impacts, and a description of the intensity/severity, duration, reversibility/irreversibility, and scale of these impacts. (Source: GRI 413: Local Communities 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 지역 사회에 중대한 실제 및 잠재적 부정적 영향이 있는 운영 부문(위치, 중대한 영향 포함)과 이 영향의 강도/심각도, 기간, 가역성/비가역성, 규모에 대한 설명을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 413: Local Communities 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Operations with significant actual and potential negative impacts on local communities, including: the location of the operations; the significant actual and potential negative impacts of operations.

title: New suppliers that were screened using social criteria
title_ko: 사회적 기준을 사용하여 심사된 신규 공급업체
description: The organization shall report the percentage of new suppliers that were screened using social criteria. This disclosure measures the extent of due diligence implementation for social impacts in the supply chain, including human rights, labor practices, and health & safety. (Source: GRI 414: Supplier Social Assessment 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 사회적 기준(인권, 노동 관행, 보건 및 안전 등)을 사용하여 심사된 신규 공급업체의 비율을 보고해야 한다. 이 공시는 공급망 사회적 영향에 대한 실사(due diligence) 이행 정도를 측정한다. (출처: GRI 414: Supplier Social Assessment 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of new suppliers that were screened using social criteria.

title: Negative social impacts in the supply chain and actions taken
title_ko: 공급망 내 부정적인 사회적 영향 및 취해진 조치
description: The organization shall report the number and percentage of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative social impacts in the supply chain, the impacts identified, and the percentage of suppliers with agreed improvements or terminated relationships. (Source: GRI 414: Supplier Social Assessment 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 공급망에서 중대한 실제 및 잠재적 부정적인 사회적 영향이 있다고 식별된 공급업체의 수와 비율, 식별된 영향, 그리고 개선 합의 또는 관계가 종료된 공급업체의 비율을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 414: Supplier Social Assessment 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Number of suppliers assessed for social impacts.
Number of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative social impacts.
Significant actual and potential negative social impacts identified in the supply chain.
Percentage of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative social impacts with which improvements were agreed upon as a result of assessment.
Percentage of suppliers identified as having significant actual and potential negative social impacts with which relationships were terminated as a result of assessment, and why.

title: Political contributions
description: The organization shall report the total monetary value of financial and in-kind political contributions made directly and indirectly by the organization, broken down by country and recipient/beneficiary, and report how the monetary value of in-kind contributions was estimated. (Source: GRI 415: Public Policy 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 직간접적으로 이루어진 금전적 및 현물 정치 기부의 총 통화 가치를 국가 및 수혜자/수령인별로 보고하고, 현물 기부의 통화 가치가 어떻게 추정되었는지 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 415: Public Policy 2016, p.8)
