required_disclosures.description: Total monetary value of financial and in-kind political contributions made directly and indirectly by the organization by country and recipient/beneficiary.
If applicable, how the monetary value of in-kind contributions was estimated.

title: Assessment of the health and safety impacts of product and service categories
title_ko: 제품 및 서비스 범주의 건강 및 안전 영향 평가
description: The organization shall report the percentage of significant product and service categories for which health and safety impacts are assessed for improvement across their life cycle. (Source: GRI 416: Customer Health and Safety 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 건강 및 안전 영향이 개선을 위해 평가되는 중대한 제품 및 서비스 범주의 비율을 제품 수명 주기 전반에 걸쳐 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 416: Customer Health and Safety 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Percentage of significant product and service categories for which health and safety impacts are assessed for improvement.

title: Incidents of non-compliance concerning the health and safety impacts of products and services
title_ko: 제품 및 서비스의 건강 및 안전 영향과 관련된 규정 미준수 사건
description: The organization shall report the total number of non-compliance incidents (fines, warnings, voluntary codes) concerning the health and safety impacts of products and services within the reporting period, and state if no non-compliance was identified. (Source: GRI 416: Customer Health and Safety 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 보고 기간 동안 제품 및 서비스의 건강 및 안전 영향과 관련된 규정 및/또는 자발적 규범 미준수 사건(과태료, 경고, 자발적 규범)의 총 수를 보고하고, 미준수 사례가 없는 경우 이를 명시해야 한다. (출처: GRI 416: Customer Health and Safety 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of incidents of non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes concerning the health and safety impacts of products and services within the reporting period, by: non-compliance with regulations resulting in a fine or penalty; non-compliance with regulations resulting in a warning; incidents of non-compliance with voluntary codes.
If the organization has not identified any non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes, a brief statement of this fact is sufficient.

title: Requirements for product and service information and labeling
title_ko: 제품 및 서비스 정보 및 라벨링 요구 사항
description: The organization shall report whether its procedures require the disclosure of information on product/service sourcing, component content, safe use, disposal, and environmental/social impacts, and the percentage of significant product/service categories covered by and assessed for compliance with these procedures. (Source: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 제품/서비스 정보 및 라벨링 절차에 따라 소싱, 내용물, 안전한 사용, 폐기 및 환경/사회적 영향에 대한 정보 공개가 요구되는지 여부와, 이러한 절차가 적용 및 준수 평가된 중대한 제품/서비스 범주의 비율을 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Whether each of the following types of information is required by the organization's procedures for product and service information and labeling: The sourcing of components; Content (substances that might produce an environmental or social impact); Safe use; Disposal and environmental/social impacts; Other (explain).
Percentage of significant product or service categories covered by and assessed for compliance with such procedures.

title: Incidents of non-compliance concerning product and service information and labeling
title_ko: 제품 및 서비스 정보 및 라벨링 관련 규정 미준수 사건
description: The organization shall report the total number of incidents of non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes concerning product and service information and labeling, broken down by: fine/penalty, warning, and voluntary code violations. (Source: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016, p.9)
description_ko: 조직은 제품 및 서비스 정보 및 라벨링 관련 규정 및/또는 자발적 규범 미준수 사건의 총 수를 벌금/과태료, 경고, 자발적 규범 위반별로 구분하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016, p.9)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of incidents of non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes concerning product and service information and labeling, by: incidents resulting in a fine or penalty; incidents resulting in a warning; incidents of non-compliance with voluntary codes.
If the organization has not identified any non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes, a brief statement of this fact is sufficient.

title: Incidents of non-compliance concerning marketing communications
title_ko: 마케팅 커뮤니케이션 관련 규정 미준수 사건
description: The organization shall report the total number of incidents of non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes concerning marketing communications (advertising, promotion, sponsorship), broken down by: fine/penalty, warning, and voluntary code violations. (Source: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016, p.10)
description_ko: 조직은 마케팅 커뮤니케이션(광고, 프로모션, 스폰서십 포함) 관련 규정 및/또는 자발적 규범 미준수 사건의 총 수를 벌금/과태료, 경고, 자발적 규범 위반별로 구분하여 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016, p.10)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of incidents of non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes concerning marketing communications, including advertising, promotion, and sponsorship, by: incidents resulting in a fine or penalty; incidents resulting in a warning; incidents of non-compliance with voluntary codes.
If the organization has not identified any non-compliance with regulations and/or voluntary codes, a brief statement of this fact is sufficient.

title: Substantiated complaints concerning breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data
title_ko: 고객 프라이버시 침해 및 고객 데이터 손실 관련 실증된 불만 사항
description: The organization shall report the total number of substantiated complaints received concerning breaches of customer privacy (from outside parties and regulatory bodies) and the total number of identified leaks, thefts, or losses of customer data. (Source: GRI 418: Customer Privacy 2016, p.8)
description_ko: 조직은 고객 프라이버시 침해와 관련된 실증된 불만 사항의 총 수(외부 당사자 및 규제 기관으로부터 접수된 불만 포함)와 식별된 고객 데이터 유출, 도난 또는 손실의 총 수를 보고해야 한다. (출처: GRI 418: Customer Privacy 2016, p.8)

required_disclosures.description: Total number of substantiated complaints received concerning breaches of customer privacy, categorized by: complaints received from outside parties and substantiated by the organization; complaints from regulatory bodies.
Total number of identified leaks, thefts, or losses of customer data.
If the organization has not identified any substantiated complaints, a brief statement of this fact is sufficient.
